ActivityDataLine.title: Activity Data Line. Details
ActivityDataLine.description: A class to associate a time period and locations (activity data) with an item for inventory planning purposes.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Activity Data Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this activity data line.

SupplyChainActivityTypeCode.title: Activity Data Line. Supply Chain Activity Type Code. Code
SupplyChainActivityTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of supply chain activity.

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Activity Data Line. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Activity Data Line. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

ActivityPeriod.title: Activity Data Line. Activity_ Period. Period
ActivityPeriod.description: The period during which the activity is realized.

ActivityOriginLocation.title: Activity Data Line. Activity Origin_ Location. Location
ActivityOriginLocation.description: Either the location where the movement of goods is observed or the location from which the goods are moved.

ActivityFinalLocation.title: Activity Data Line. Activity Final_ Location. Location
ActivityFinalLocation.description: The location to which the goods are moved.

SalesItem.title: Activity Data Line. Sales Item
SalesItem.description: Sales information for an item to which this line applies.

ActivityProperty.title: Activity Property. Details
ActivityProperty.description: A class to define a name/value pair for a property of an inventory planning activity.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Name.title: Activity Property. Name
Name.description: The name of this activity property.

Value.title: Activity Property. Value. Text
Value.description: The value of this activity property.

Address.title: Address. Details
Address.description: A class to define common information related to an address.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Address. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this address within an agreed scheme of address identifiers.

AddressTypeCode.title: Address. Address Type Code. Code
AddressTypeCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the type of this address.

AddressFormatCode.title: Address. Address Format Code. Code
AddressFormatCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the format of this address.

Postbox.title: Address. Postbox. Text
Postbox.description: A post office box number registered for postal delivery by a postal service provider.

Floor.title: Address. Floor. Text
Floor.description: An identifiable floor of a building.

Room.title: Address. Room. Text
Room.description: An identifiable room, suite, or apartment of a building.

StreetName.title: Address. Street Name. Name
StreetName.description: The name of the street, road, avenue, way, etc. to which the number of the building is attached.

AdditionalStreetName.title: Address. Additional_ Street Name. Name
AdditionalStreetName.description: An additional street name used to further clarify the address.

BlockName.title: Address. Block Name. Name
BlockName.description: The name of the block (an area surrounded by streets and usually containing several buildings) in which this address is located.

BuildingNumber.title: Address. Building Number. Text
BuildingNumber.description: The number of a building within the street.

Description.title: Address. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing this address for clarification or specificity

InhouseMail.title: Address. Inhouse_ Mail. Text
InhouseMail.description: The specific identifable location within a building where mail is delivered.

MarkAttention.title: Address. Mark Attention. Text
MarkAttention.description: The name, expressed as text, of a person or department in an organization to whose attention incoming mail is directed; corresponds to the printed forms "for the attention of", "FAO", and ATTN:".

MarkCare.title: Address. Mark Care. Text
MarkCare.description: The name, expressed as text, of a person or organization at this address into whose care incoming mail is entrusted; corresponds to the printed forms "care of" and "c/o".

PlotIdentification.title: Address. Plot Identification. Text
PlotIdentification.description: An identifier (e.g., a parcel number) for the piece of land associated with this address.

CitySubdivisionName.title: Address. City Subdivision Name. Name
CitySubdivisionName.description: The name of the subdivision of a city, town, or village in which this address is located, such as the name of its district or borough.

CityName.title: Address. City Name. Name
CityName.description: The name of a city, town, or village.

PostalZone.title: Address. Postal_ Zone. Text
PostalZone.description: The postal identifier for this address according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

CountrySubentity.title: Address. Country Subentity. Text
CountrySubentity.description: The political or administrative division of a country in which this address is located, such as the name of its county, province, or state, expressed as text.

CountrySubentityCode.title: Address. Country Subentity Code. Code
CountrySubentityCode.description: The political or administrative division of a country in which this address is located, such as a county, province, or state, expressed as a code (typically nationally agreed).

Region.title: Address. Region. Text
Region.description: The recognized geographic or economic region or group of countries in which this address is located.

District.title: Address. District. Text
District.description: The district or geographical division of a country or region in which this address is located.

TimezoneOffset.title: Address. Timezone Offset. Text
TimezoneOffset.description: The time zone in which this address is located (as an offset from Universal Coordinated Time (UTC)) at the time of exchange.

Country.title: Address. Country
Country.description: The country in which this address is situated.

LocationCoordinate.title: Address. Location Coordinate
LocationCoordinate.description: The geographical coordinates of this address.

AddressLine.title: Address Line. Details
AddressLine.description: A class to define an unstructured address line.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Line.title: Address Line. Line. Text
Line.description: An address line expressed as unstructured text.

AirTransport.title: Air Transport. Details
AirTransport.description: A class to identify a specific aircraft used for transportation.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

AircraftID.title: Air Transport. Aircraft Identifier. Identifier
AircraftID.description: An identifer for a specific aircraft.

AllowanceCharge.title: Allowance Charge. Details
AllowanceCharge.description: A class to describe information about a charge or discount as applied to a price component.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Allowance Charge. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this allowance or charge.

ChargeIndicator.title: Allowance Charge. Charge_ Indicator. Indicator
ChargeIndicator.description: An indicator that this AllowanceCharge describes a charge (true) or a discount (false).

AllowanceChargeReasonCode.title: Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge Reason Code. Code
AllowanceChargeReasonCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the reason for this allowance or charge.

AllowanceChargeReason.title: Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge_ Reason. Text
AllowanceChargeReason.description: The reason for this allowance or charge.

MultiplierFactorNumeric.title: Allowance Charge. Multiplier_ Factor. Numeric
MultiplierFactorNumeric.description: A number by which the base amount is multiplied to calculate the actual amount of this allowance or charge.

PrepaidIndicator.title: Allowance Charge. Prepaid_ Indicator. Indicator
PrepaidIndicator.description: An indicator that this allowance or charge is prepaid (true) or not (false).

SequenceNumeric.title: Allowance Charge. Sequence. Numeric
SequenceNumeric.description: A number indicating the order of this allowance or charge in the sequence of calculations applied when there are multiple allowances or charges.

Amount.title: Allowance Charge. Amount
Amount.description: The monetary amount of this allowance or charge to be applied.

BaseAmount.title: Allowance Charge. Base_ Amount. Amount
BaseAmount.description: The monetary amount to which the multiplier factor is applied in calculating the amount of this allowance or charge.

AccountingCostCode.title: Allowance Charge. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The accounting cost centre used by the buyer to account for this allowance or charge, expressed as a code.

AccountingCost.title: Allowance Charge. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The accounting cost centre used by the buyer to account for this allowance or charge, expressed as text.

PerUnitAmount.title: Allowance Charge. Per Unit_ Amount. Amount
PerUnitAmount.description: The allowance or charge per item; the total allowance or charge is calculated by multiplying the per unit amount by the quantity of items, either at the level of the individual transaction line or for the total number of items in the document, depending on the context in which it appears.

TaxCategory.title: Allowance Charge. Tax Category
TaxCategory.description: A tax category applicable to this allowance or charge.

TaxTotal.title: Allowance Charge. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total of all the taxes applicable to this allowance or charge.

PaymentMeans.title: Allowance Charge. Payment Means
PaymentMeans.description: A means of payment for this allowance or charge.

AppealTerms.title: Appeal Terms. Details
AppealTerms.description: A class to describe the terms and conditions, set by the contracting authority, under which an appeal can be lodged for a tender award.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Description.title: Appeal Terms. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing the terms of an appeal.

PresentationPeriod.title: Appeal Terms. Presentation_ Period. Period
PresentationPeriod.description: The period during which an appeal can be presented.

AppealInformationParty.title: Appeal Terms. Appeal Information_ Party. Party
AppealInformationParty.description: The party presenting the information for an appeal.

AppealReceiverParty.title: Appeal Terms. Appeal Receiver_ Party. Party
AppealReceiverParty.description: The party to whom an appeal should be presented.

MediationParty.title: Appeal Terms. Mediation_ Party. Party
MediationParty.description: The party that has been appointed to mediate any appeal.

Attachment.title: Attachment. Details
Attachment.description: A class to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject.title: Attachment. Embedded_ Document. Binary Object
EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject.description: A binary large object containing an attached document.

EmbeddedDocument.title: Attachment. Embedded_ Document. Text
EmbeddedDocument.description: A clear text object containing an attached document.

ExternalReference.title: Attachment. External Reference
ExternalReference.description: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Attestation.title: Attestation. Details
Attestation.description: A class describing an attestation made for an item

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Attestation. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this attestation.

Name.title: Attestation. Name
Name.description: A name of this attestation.

Description.title: Attestation. Description. Text
Description.description: A textual description of this attestation.

Note.title: Attestation. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

AcceptanceIndicator.title: Attestation. Acceptance Indicator. Indicator
AcceptanceIndicator.description: Indicates whether the attestation has been accepted or not.

ValidityPeriod.title: Attestation. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period during which this attestation is valid

AttestationLine.title: Attestation. Attestation Line
AttestationLine.description: An attestation or statement made and which forms part of this attestation

AttestationLine.title: Attestation Line. Details
AttestationLine.description: A class describing an attestation line

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Attestation Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this attestation line

TypeCode.title: Attestation Line. Type_ Code. Code
TypeCode.description: A code describing the type of attestation line or statement

Description.title: Attestation Line. Description. Text
Description.description: A textual description of this attestation line

CriterionItem.title: Attestation Line. Criterion Item
CriterionItem.description: Criterion items associated with this attestation line

SubAttestationLine.title: Attestation Line. Sub_ Attestation Line. Attestation Line
SubAttestationLine.description: An attestation line subsidiary to this attestation line

AuctionTerms.title: Auction Terms. Details
AuctionTerms.description: A class to describe the terms to be fulfilled by tenderers if an auction is to be executed before the awarding of a tender.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

AuctionConstraintIndicator.title: Auction Terms. Auction_ Constraint. Indicator
AuctionConstraintIndicator.description: Indicates whether an electronic auction will be used before the awarding of a contract (true) or not (false).

JustificationDescription.title: Auction Terms. Justification_ Description. Text
JustificationDescription.description: Text describing a justification for the use of an auction in awarding the tender.

Description.title: Auction Terms. Description. Text
Description.description: Text for tenderers describing terms governing the auction.

ConditionsDescription.title: Auction Terms. Conditions_ Description. Text
ConditionsDescription.description: Text describing the conditions under which the tenderers will be able to bid as part of the auction.

ElectronicDeviceDescription.title: Auction Terms. Electronic Device_ Description. Text
ElectronicDeviceDescription.description: Text describing an electronic device used for the auction, including associated connectivity specifications.

AuctionURI.title: Auction Terms. Auction_ URI. Identifier
AuctionURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the electronic device used for the auction.

Authorization.title: Authorization. Details
Authorization.description: A class to define an authorization that as been issued

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

PurposeCode.title: Authorization. Purpose_ Code. Code
PurposeCode.description: A code defining the business purpose or scope of this authorization

Purpose.title: Authorization. Purpose. Text
Purpose.description: The purpose or scope of this authorization expressed as a text

ValidityPeriod.title: Authorization. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period during which this authorization is valid

Certificate.title: Authorization. Certificate
Certificate.description: One or more certificates related to this authorization

AwardingCriterion.title: Awarding Criterion. Details
AwardingCriterion.description: A class to define a criterion from the contracting party that will be taken into account when awarding a contract. An awarding criterion can be objective, when it can be evaluated following a formula, or subjective, when human analysis is required.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Awarding Criterion. Identifier
ID.description: Identifies a specific awarding criterion.

AwardingCriterionTypeCode.title: Awarding Criterion. Awarding Criterion Type Code. Code
AwardingCriterionTypeCode.description: A code used to define this awarding criterion.

Name.title: Awarding Criterion. Name
Name.description: The name of this awarding criterion.

Description.title: Awarding Criterion. Description. Text
Description.description: A description of the awarding criterion.

WeightNumeric.title: Awarding Criterion. Weight Numeric. Numeric
WeightNumeric.description: A number defining the comparative weighting assigned to this awarding criterion, to enable formulaic evaluation.

Weight.title: Awarding Criterion. Weight. Text
Weight.description: A description of the comparative weighting for this awarding criterion.

CalculationExpression.title: Awarding Criterion. Calculation Expression. Text
CalculationExpression.description: The mathematical expression that will be used to evaluate this criterion.

CalculationExpressionCode.title: Awarding Criterion. Calculation Expression Code. Code
CalculationExpressionCode.description: A code identifying the mathematical expression that will be used to evaluate this criterion.

MinimumQuantity.title: Awarding Criterion. Minimum_ Quantity. Quantity
MinimumQuantity.description: The minimum quantity for an awarding criterion.

MaximumQuantity.title: Awarding Criterion. Maximum_ Quantity. Quantity
MaximumQuantity.description: The maximum quantity for an awarding criterion.

MinimumAmount.title: Awarding Criterion. Minimum_ Amount. Amount
MinimumAmount.description: The minimum monetary amount for an awarding criterion.

MaximumAmount.title: Awarding Criterion. Maximum_ Amount. Amount
MaximumAmount.description: The maximum monetary amount for an awarding criterion.

MinimumImprovementBid.title: Awarding Criterion. Minimum Improvement Bid. Text
MinimumImprovementBid.description: Describes the minimum improvement bid for this awarding criterion when used in an auction.

SubordinateAwardingCriterion.title: Awarding Criterion. Subordinate_ Awarding Criterion. Awarding Criterion

AwardingCriterionResponse.title: Awarding Criterion Response. Details
AwardingCriterionResponse.description: Defines the response for an awarding criterion from the tendering party.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Awarding Criterion Response. Identifier
ID.description: An identification of this awarding criterion response.

AwardingCriterionID.title: Awarding Criterion Response. Awarding Criterion Identifier. Identifier
AwardingCriterionID.description: An identifer of the awarding criterion being referred to.

AwardingCriterionDescription.title: Awarding Criterion Response. Awarding Criterion_ Description. Text

Quantity.title: Awarding Criterion Response. Quantity
Quantity.description: Specifies the quantity tendered for this awarding criterion.

Amount.title: Awarding Criterion Response. Amount
Amount.description: Specifies the monetary amount tendered for this awarding criterion.

SubordinateAwardingCriterionResponse.title: Awarding Criterion Response. Subordinate_ Awarding Criterion Response. Awarding Criterion Response
SubordinateAwardingCriterionResponse.description: Defines responses to any subsidiary awarding criterion.

AwardingTerms.title: Awarding Terms. Details
AwardingTerms.description: A class to define the terms for awarding a contract.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

WeightingAlgorithmCode.title: Awarding Terms. Weighting Algorithm Code. Code
WeightingAlgorithmCode.description: A code signifying the weighting algorithm for awarding criteria. When multiple awarding criteria is used, different weighting and choices management algorithms based upon scores and weights of all award criteria can be used. An algorithm for weighting criteria shall be reported in the call for tenders document. It is used to determine how to perform the final management of tenders based on the results in each of the established award criteria

Description.title: Awarding Terms. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing terms under which the contract is to be awarded.

TechnicalCommitteeDescription.title: Awarding Terms. Technical Committee_ Description. Text
TechnicalCommitteeDescription.description: Text describing the committee of experts evaluating the subjective criteria for awarding the contract.

LowTendersDescription.title: Awarding Terms. Low Tenders_ Description. Text
LowTendersDescription.description: Text describing the exclusion criterion for abnormally low tenders.

PrizeIndicator.title: Awarding Terms. Prize Indicator. Indicator
PrizeIndicator.description: Indicates whether a prize will be awarded (true) or not (false).

PrizeDescription.title: Awarding Terms. Prize Description. Text
PrizeDescription.description: Number and value of the prizes to be awarded.

PaymentDescription.title: Awarding Terms. Payment Description. Text
PaymentDescription.description: Details of payments to all participants.

FollowupContractIndicator.title: Awarding Terms. Followup Contract Indicator. Indicator
FollowupContractIndicator.description: Indicates if any service contract following the contest will be awarded to the winner or one of the winners of the contest (true) or not (false).

BindingOnBuyerIndicator.title: Awarding Terms. Binding On Buyer Indicator. Indicator
BindingOnBuyerIndicator.description: Indicates if the decision is binding on the buyer (true) or not (false).

NoFurtherNegotiationIndicator.title: Awarding Terms. No Further Negotiation Indicator. Indicator
NoFurtherNegotiationIndicator.description: Indicates if no further negotiation is allowed (true) or not (false).

AwardingCriterion.title: Awarding Terms. Awarding Criterion
AwardingCriterion.description: Defines a criterion for awarding this tender.

TechnicalCommitteePerson.title: Awarding Terms. Technical Committee_ Person. Person
TechnicalCommitteePerson.description: A member of a committee of experts evaluating the subjective criteria for awarding the contract.

Prize.title: Awarding Terms. Prize
Prize.description: Information about the value amount that will be offered to the winner depending on his rank.

BallastWaterSummary.title: Ballast Water Summary. Details
BallastWaterSummary.description: A class to summarize the ballast water management of a vessel.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Ballast Water Summary. Identifier
ID.description: An identification of this ballast water summary.

ManagementPlanOnBoardIndicator.title: Ballast Water Summary. Management Plan On Board_ Indicator. Indicator
ManagementPlanOnBoardIndicator.description: An indication of whether a waste water management plan is on board (true) or not (false).

ManagementPlanImplementedIndicator.title: Ballast Water Summary. Management Plan Implemented_ Indicator. Indicator
ManagementPlanImplementedIndicator.description: An indication of whether a waste water management plan has been implemented (true) or not (false).

IMOGuidelinesOnBoardIndicator.title: Ballast Water Summary. IMO Guidelines On Board_ Indicator. Indicator
IMOGuidelinesOnBoardIndicator.description: An indication of whether International Maritime Organization (IMO) ballast water guidelines are on board (true) or not (false).

TotalBallastTanksOnBoardQuantity.title: Ballast Water Summary. Total Ballast Tanks On Board_ Quantity. Quantity
TotalBallastTanksOnBoardQuantity.description: The total number of ballast tanks on board the vessel.

TanksInBallastQuantity.title: Ballast Water Summary. Tanks In Ballast_ Quantity. Quantity
TanksInBallastQuantity.description: The number of tanks in the ballast of the vessel.

TanksExchangedQuantity.title: Ballast Water Summary. Tanks Exchanged_ Quantity. Quantity
TanksExchangedQuantity.description: The number of tanks being exchanged as part of this ballast water summary.

TanksNotExchangedQuantity.title: Ballast Water Summary. Tanks Not Exchanged_ Quantity. Quantity
TanksNotExchangedQuantity.description: The quantity of tanks not being exchanged.

TotalBallastWaterOnBoardMeasure.title: Ballast Water Summary. Total Ballast Water On Board_ Measure. Measure
TotalBallastWaterOnBoardMeasure.description: The messure of the total ballast water on board the vessel.

TotalBallastWaterCapacityMeasure.title: Ballast Water Summary. Total Ballast Water_ Capacity Measure. Measure
TotalBallastWaterCapacityMeasure.description: The total ballast water capacity of the vessel.

OtherControlActions.title: Ballast Water Summary. Other Control_ Actions Text. Text
OtherControlActions.description: A text describing any other control actions that are part of this ballast water summary.

NoControlActionsReason.title: Ballast Water Summary. No Control_ Actions Reason. Text
NoControlActionsReason.description: A textual description of the reason if no control actions are being taken.

UptakeBallastWaterTransaction.title: Ballast Water Summary. Uptake_ Ballast Water Transaction. Ballast Water Transaction

ExchangeBallastWaterTransaction.title: Ballast Water Summary. Exchange_ Ballast Water Transaction. Ballast Water Transaction

DischargeBallastWaterTransaction.title: Ballast Water Summary. Discharge_ Ballast Water Transaction. Ballast Water Transaction

ResponsibleOfficerPerson.title: Ballast Water Summary. Responsible Officer_ Person. Person
ResponsibleOfficerPerson.description: The officer responsible for this ballast water summery.

BallastWaterTransaction.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Details
BallastWaterTransaction.description: A class to define a ballast water transaction, such as the uptake, exchange or discharge of ballast water.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

TankID.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Tank Identifier. Identifier
TankID.description: An identifier for the ballast water tank being used in this ballast water transaction.

TankTypeCode.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Tank Type Code. Code
TankTypeCode.description: A code for the type of ballast water tank being used in the ballast water transaction.

ExchangeMethodCode.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Exchange_ Method Code. Code
ExchangeMethodCode.description: A code expressing how ballast water is being filled into or discharged from the tank.

ExchangedPercent.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Exchanged Percent. Percent
ExchangedPercent.description: The percentage of the ballast water in the tank being exchanged in this ballast water transaction.

VolumeMeasure.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Volume Measure. Measure
VolumeMeasure.description: The volume of ballast water being exchanged in this ballast water transaction.

SeaHeightMeasure.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Sea Height Measure. Measure
SeaHeightMeasure.description: A measure of the sea height at the time of the transaction.

SalinityMeasure.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Salinity Measure. Measure
SalinityMeasure.description: A measure for the salinity of the water in the tank.

TransactionDate.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Transaction Date. Date
TransactionDate.description: The date when this ballast water transaction takes place.

Location.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Location
Location.description: The location where this ballast water transaction takes place.

BallastWaterTemperature.title: Ballast Water Transaction. Ballast Water_ Temperature. Temperature
BallastWaterTemperature.description: The temperature of the ballast water at time of transaction.
