BudgetAccount.title: Budget Account. Details
BudgetAccount.description: A class to define a budget account.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Budget Account. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for the budget account, typically an internal accounting reference.

BudgetYearNumeric.title: Budget Account. Budget Year. Numeric
BudgetYearNumeric.description: The number of the year for this budget account, e.g. 2012

RequiredClassificationScheme.title: Budget Account. Required_ Classification Scheme. Classification Scheme
RequiredClassificationScheme.description: A classification scheme required for this budget account.

BudgetAccountLine.title: Budget Account Line. Details
BudgetAccountLine.description: A class to define a budget account line.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Budget Account Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this budget account line.

TotalAmount.title: Budget Account Line. Total_ Amount. Amount
TotalAmount.description: The total monetary amount for this budget account line.

BudgetAccount.title: Budget Account Line. Budget Account
BudgetAccount.description: An account covering this budget account line.

Capability.title: Capability. Details
Capability.description: A class to describe a specific capability of an organization.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

CapabilityTypeCode.title: Capability. Capability Type Code. Code
CapabilityTypeCode.description: This class can be used as Financial or Technical capabilities. For instance, "Turnover" or "Qualified Engineers" are two possible codes.

ValueAmount.title: Capability. Value. Amount
ValueAmount.description: A monetary amount as a measure of this capability.

ValueQuantity.title: Capability. Value_ Quantity. Quantity
ValueQuantity.description: A quantity as a measure of this capability.

EvidenceSupplied.title: Capability. Evidence Supplied
EvidenceSupplied.description: The evidence that supports the capability claim.

ValidityPeriod.title: Capability. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period of time for which this capability is (or has been) valid.

WebSite.title: Capability. Web Site
WebSite.description: A web site where the capability is detailed.

CardAccount.title: Card Account. Details
CardAccount.description: A class to define a credit card, debit card, or charge card account.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

PrimaryAccountNumberID.title: Card Account. Primary_ Account Number. Identifier
PrimaryAccountNumberID.description: An identifier of the card (e.g., the Primary Account Number (PAN)).

NetworkID.title: Card Account. Network. Identifier
NetworkID.description: An identifier for the financial service network provider of the card.

CardTypeCode.title: Card Account. Card Type Code. Code
CardTypeCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the type of card. Examples of types are "debit", "credit" and "purchasing"

ValidityStartDate.title: Card Account. Validity Start Date. Date
ValidityStartDate.description: The date from which the card is valid.

ExpiryDate.title: Card Account. Expiry Date. Date
ExpiryDate.description: The date on which the card expires.

IssuerID.title: Card Account. Issuer. Identifier
IssuerID.description: An identifier for the institution issuing the card.

IssueNumberID.title: Card Account. Issue Number. Identifier
IssueNumberID.description: An identifier for the card, specified by the issuer.

CV2ID.title: Card Account. CV2. Identifier
CV2ID.description: An identifier for the Card Verification Value (often found on the reverse of the card itself).

CardChipCode.title: Card Account. Card Chip Code. Code
CardChipCode.description: A mutually agreed code to distinguish between CHIP and MAG STRIPE cards.

ChipApplicationID.title: Card Account. Chip_ Application. Identifier
ChipApplicationID.description: An identifier on the chip card for the application that provides the quoted information; an AID (application ID).

RoleCode.title: Card Account. Role Code. Code
RoleCode.description: The role of this card or the card holder (e.g., the buyer, when the card is used as a payment means to pay for an item), expressed as a code.

CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdateLine.title: Catalogue Item Specification Update Line. Details
CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdateLine.description: A class to define a line describing the transaction that updates the specification of an item in a catalogue.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Catalogue Item Specification Update Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for the line to be updated in a catalogue.

ContractorCustomerParty.title: Catalogue Item Specification Update Line. Contractor_ Customer Party. Customer Party
ContractorCustomerParty.description: The customer responsible for the contract associated with the catalogue item.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Catalogue Item Specification Update Line. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party
SellerSupplierParty.description: The seller/supplier responsible for the contract associated with the catalogue item.

Item.title: Catalogue Item Specification Update Line. Item
Item.description: The catalogue item to be updated.

CatalogueLine.title: Catalogue Line. Details
CatalogueLine.description: A class to define a line in a Catalogue describing a purchasable item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Catalogue Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for the line in the catalogue.

ActionCode.title: Catalogue Line. Action Code. Code
ActionCode.description: A code signifying the action required to synchronize this catalogue line. Recommend codes (delete, update, add)

LifeCycleStatusCode.title: Catalogue Line. Life Cycle Status Code. Code
LifeCycleStatusCode.description: A code signifying the life cycle status of this catalogue line. Examples are pre-order, end of production

ContractSubdivision.title: Catalogue Line. Contract Subdivision. Text
ContractSubdivision.description: A subdivision of a contract or tender covering this catalogue line.

Note.title: Catalogue Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

OrderableIndicator.title: Catalogue Line. Orderable_ Indicator. Indicator
OrderableIndicator.description: An indicator that this catalogue line describes an orderable item (true) or is included for reference purposes only (false).

OrderableUnit.title: Catalogue Line. Orderable_ Unit. Text
OrderableUnit.description: A textual description of the units in which the item described in this catalogue line can be ordered.

ContentUnitQuantity.title: Catalogue Line. Content Unit. Quantity
ContentUnitQuantity.description: The numeric quantity of the ordering unit (and units of measure) of the catalogue line.

OrderQuantityIncrementNumeric.title: Catalogue Line. Order Quantity Increment. Numeric
OrderQuantityIncrementNumeric.description: The number of items that can set the order quantity increments.

MinimumOrderQuantity.title: Catalogue Line. Minimum_ Order Quantity. Quantity
MinimumOrderQuantity.description: The minimum amount of the item described in this catalogue line that can be ordered.

MaximumOrderQuantity.title: Catalogue Line. Maximum_ Order Quantity. Quantity
MaximumOrderQuantity.description: The maximum amount of the item described in this catalogue line that can be ordered.

WarrantyInformation.title: Catalogue Line. Warranty_ Information. Text
WarrantyInformation.description: Text about a warranty (provided by WarrantyParty) for the good or service described in this catalogue line.

PackLevelCode.title: Catalogue Line. Pack Level Code. Code
PackLevelCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the level of packaging associated with the item described in this catalogue line.

ContractorCustomerParty.title: Catalogue Line. Contractor_ Customer Party. Customer Party
ContractorCustomerParty.description: The customer responsible for the contract with which this catalogue line is associated.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Catalogue Line. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party
SellerSupplierParty.description: The seller/supplier responsible for the contract with which this catalogue line is associated.

WarrantyParty.title: Catalogue Line. Warranty_ Party. Party
WarrantyParty.description: The party responsible for any warranty associated with the item described in this catalogue line.

WarrantyValidityPeriod.title: Catalogue Line. Warranty Validity_ Period. Period
WarrantyValidityPeriod.description: The period for which a warranty associated with the item in this catalogue line is valid.

LineValidityPeriod.title: Catalogue Line. Line Validity_ Period. Period
LineValidityPeriod.description: The period for which the information in this catalogue line is valid.

ItemComparison.title: Catalogue Line. Item Comparison
ItemComparison.description: A combination of price and quantity used to provide price comparisons based on different sizes of order.

ComponentRelatedItem.title: Catalogue Line. Component_ Related Item. Related Item
ComponentRelatedItem.description: An item that may be a component of the item in this catalogue line.

AccessoryRelatedItem.title: Catalogue Line. Accessory_ Related Item. Related Item
AccessoryRelatedItem.description: An item that may be an optional accessory of the item in this catalogue line.

RequiredRelatedItem.title: Catalogue Line. Required_ Related Item. Related Item
RequiredRelatedItem.description: An item that may be required for the item in this catalogue line.

ReplacementRelatedItem.title: Catalogue Line. Replacement_ Related Item. Related Item
ReplacementRelatedItem.description: An item that may be a replacement for the item in this catalogue line.

ComplementaryRelatedItem.title: Catalogue Line. Complementary_ Related Item. Related Item
ComplementaryRelatedItem.description: An item that may complement the item in this catalogue line.

ReplacedRelatedItem.title: Catalogue Line. Replaced_ Related Item. Related Item
ReplacedRelatedItem.description: An item in an existing catalogue that is being replaced by the item in this catalogue line.

RequiredItemLocationQuantity.title: Catalogue Line. Required_ Item Location Quantity. Item Location Quantity
RequiredItemLocationQuantity.description: Properties of the item in this catalogue line that are dependent on location and quantity.

DocumentReference.title: Catalogue Line. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document associated with this catalogue line.

Item.title: Catalogue Line. Item
Item.description: A specification of the item itself.

KeywordItemProperty.title: Catalogue Line. Keyword_ Item Property. Item Property
KeywordItemProperty.description: A property of the item in this catalogue line.

CallForTendersLineReference.title: Catalogue Line. Call For Tenders_ Line Reference. Line Reference
CallForTendersLineReference.description: Reference to a Line on a Call For Tenders document.

CallForTendersDocumentReference.title: Catalogue Line. Call For Tenders_ Document Reference. Document Reference
CallForTendersDocumentReference.description: A class defining references to a Call For Tenders document.

CataloguePricingUpdateLine.title: Catalogue Pricing Update Line. Details
CataloguePricingUpdateLine.description: A class to define a line describing a pricing update to a catalogue line.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Catalogue Pricing Update Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for the catalogue line to be updated.

ContractorCustomerParty.title: Catalogue Pricing Update Line. Contractor_ Customer Party. Customer Party
ContractorCustomerParty.description: The customer responsible for the contract associated with the catalogue line being updated.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Catalogue Pricing Update Line. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party
SellerSupplierParty.description: The seller/supplier responsible for the contract associated with the catalogue line being updated.

RequiredItemLocationQuantity.title: Catalogue Pricing Update Line. Required_ Item Location Quantity. Item Location Quantity
RequiredItemLocationQuantity.description: Updated properties of the item in this catalogue line that are dependent on location and quantity.

CatalogueReference.title: Catalogue Reference. Details
CatalogueReference.description: A class to define a reference to a catalogue.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Catalogue Reference. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for a specific catalogue.

UUID.title: Catalogue Reference. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for a specific catalogue.

IssueDate.title: Catalogue Reference. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date on which the catalogue was issued.

IssueTime.title: Catalogue Reference. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time at which the catalogue was issued.

RevisionDate.title: Catalogue Reference. Revision Date. Date
RevisionDate.description: The date on which the information in the catalogue was last revised.

RevisionTime.title: Catalogue Reference. Revision Time. Time
RevisionTime.description: The time at which the information in the catalogue was last revised.

Note.title: Catalogue Reference. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Catalogue Reference. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: An identifier for the current version of the catalogue.

PreviousVersionID.title: Catalogue Reference. Previous_ Version. Identifier
PreviousVersionID.description: An identifier for the previous version of the catalogue that is superseded by this version.

CatalogueRequestLine.title: Catalogue Request Line. Details
CatalogueRequestLine.description: A class to define a line describing a request for a catalogue line.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Catalogue Request Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for the requested catalogue line.

ContractSubdivision.title: Catalogue Request Line. Contract Subdivision. Text
ContractSubdivision.description: A subdivision of a contract or tender covering the line being requested.

Note.title: Catalogue Request Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

LineValidityPeriod.title: Catalogue Request Line. Line Validity_ Period. Period
LineValidityPeriod.description: The period for which the information in the requested catalogue line is valid.

RequiredItemLocationQuantity.title: Catalogue Request Line. Required_ Item Location Quantity. Item Location Quantity
RequiredItemLocationQuantity.description: Properties of the item in the requested catalogue line that are dependent on location and quantity.

Item.title: Catalogue Request Line. Item
Item.description: The item associated with the requested catalogue line.

Certificate.title: Certificate. Details
Certificate.description: A class to define a certificate applied to the item. Certificated can be a requirement to sell goods or services in a jurisdiction.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Certificate. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this certificate.

CertificateTypeCode.title: Certificate. Certificate Type Code. Code
CertificateTypeCode.description: The type of this certificate, expressed as a code. The type specifies what array it belongs to, e.g.. Environmental, security, health improvement etc.

CertificateType.title: Certificate. Certificate Type. Text
CertificateType.description: The type of this certificate, expressed as a text.

Remarks.title: Certificate. Remarks. Text
Remarks.description: Remarks by the applicant for this certificate.

IssuerParty.title: Certificate. Issuer_ Party. Party
IssuerParty.description: The authorized organization that issued this certificate, the provider of the certificate.

DocumentReference.title: Certificate. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document relevant to this certificate or an application for this certificate.

Signature.title: Certificate. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this certificate.

CertificateOfOriginApplication.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Details
CertificateOfOriginApplication.description: A class to define an application for a Certificate of Origin (CoO).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ReferenceID.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Reference. Identifier
ReferenceID.description: An identifier for a reference as part of the CoO application.

CertificateType.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Certificate Type. Text
CertificateType.description: The type of CoO being applied for (Ordinary, Re-export, Commonwealth Preferential, etc.).

ApplicationStatusCode.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Application Status Code. Code
ApplicationStatusCode.description: A code signifying the status of the application (revision, replacement, etc.).

OriginalJobID.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Original_ Job Identifier. Identifier
OriginalJobID.description: The latest job number given to the CoO application. This is used by the system to keep track of amendments to or cancellation of any earlier applications.

PreviousJobID.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Previous_ Job Identifier. Identifier
PreviousJobID.description: An identifier for the previous job used in case the application requires query or change.

Remarks.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Remarks. Text
Remarks.description: Remarks by the applicant for the CoO.

Shipment.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Shipment
Shipment.description: The shipment of goods covered by the CoO.

EndorserParty.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Endorser Party
EndorserParty.description: A party providing an endorsement to the CoO.

PreparationParty.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Preparation_ Party. Party
PreparationParty.description: The party (individual, group, or body) that prepared this CoO application.

IssuerParty.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Issuer_ Party. Party
IssuerParty.description: The organization authorized to issue the CoO requested by this application.

ExporterParty.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Exporter_ Party. Party
ExporterParty.description: The party making an export declaration, or on behalf of which the export declaration is made, and that is the owner of the goods or has similar right of disposal over them at the time when the declaration is accepted.

ImporterParty.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Importer_ Party. Party
ImporterParty.description: The party making an import declaration, or on behalf of which a customs clearing agent or other authorized person makes an import declaration. This may include a person who has possession of the goods or to whom the goods are consigned.

IssuingCountry.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Issuing_ Country. Country
IssuingCountry.description: The country where the requested CoO will be issued.

DocumentDistribution.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Document Distribution
DocumentDistribution.description: An interested party to which the CoO is to be distributed.

SupportingDocumentReference.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Supporting_ Document Reference. Document Reference
SupportingDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document supporting this application.

Signature.title: Certificate Of Origin Application. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this application.

ClassificationCategory.title: Classification Category. Details
ClassificationCategory.description: A class to define a category within a classification scheme.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Name.title: Classification Category. Name
Name.description: The name of this category within the classification scheme.

CodeValue.title: Classification Category. Code Value. Text
CodeValue.description: The value of a code used to identify this category within the classification scheme.

CategorizesClassificationCategory.title: Classification Category. Categorizes_ Classification Category. Classification Category
CategorizesClassificationCategory.description: A recursive description of a subcategory of this category.

ClassificationScheme.title: Classification Scheme. Details
ClassificationScheme.description: A class to define a classification scheme, such as a taxonomy for classifying goods or services.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Classification Scheme. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this classification scheme.

UUID.title: Classification Scheme. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for this classification scheme.

LastRevisionDate.title: Classification Scheme. Last_ Revision Date. Date
LastRevisionDate.description: The date on which this classification scheme was last revised.

LastRevisionTime.title: Classification Scheme. Last_ Revision Time. Time
LastRevisionTime.description: The time at which this classification scheme was last revised.

Note.title: Classification Scheme. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Name.title: Classification Scheme. Name
Name.description: The name of this classification scheme.

AgencyID.title: Classification Scheme. Agency Identifier. Identifier
AgencyID.description: An identifier for the agency that maintains this classification scheme.

AgencyName.title: Classification Scheme. Agency Name. Name
AgencyName.description: The name of the agency that maintains the classification scheme.

VersionID.title: Classification Scheme. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: An identifier for the version of this classification scheme.

URI.title: Classification Scheme. URI. Identifier
URI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the documentation for this classification scheme.

SchemeURI.title: Classification Scheme. Scheme_ URI. Identifier
SchemeURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of this classification scheme.

LanguageID.title: Classification Scheme. Language. Identifier
LanguageID.description: An identifier for the language of this classification scheme.

ClassificationCategory.title: Classification Scheme. Classification Category
ClassificationCategory.description: A description of a category within this classification scheme.

Clause.title: Clause. Details
Clause.description: A class to define a clause (a distinct article or provision) in a contract, treaty, will, or other formal or legal written document requiring compliance.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Clause. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this clause.

CommodityClassification.title: Commodity Classification. Details
CommodityClassification.description: A class to describe the classification of a commodity.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

NatureCode.title: Commodity Classification. Nature Code. Code
NatureCode.description: A code defined by a specific maintenance agency signifying the high-level nature of the commodity.

CargoTypeCode.title: Commodity Classification. Cargo Type Code. Code
CargoTypeCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the type of cargo for purposes of commodity classification.

CommodityCode.title: Commodity Classification. Commodity Code. Code
CommodityCode.description: The harmonized international commodity code for cross border and regulatory (customs and trade statistics) purposes.

ItemClassificationCode.title: Commodity Classification. Item Classification Code. Code
ItemClassificationCode.description: A code signifying the trade classification of the commodity.

Communication.title: Communication. Details
Communication.description: A class to describe a means of communication.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ChannelCode.title: Communication. Channel Code. Code
ChannelCode.description: The method of communication, expressed as a code.

Channel.title: Communication. Channel. Text
Channel.description: The method of communication, expressed as text.

Value.title: Communication. Value. Text
Value.description: An identifying value (phone number, email address, etc.) for this channel of communication

CompletedTask.title: Completed Task. Details
CompletedTask.description: A class to describe the completion of a specific task in the tendering process.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

AnnualAverageAmount.title: Completed Task. Annual_ Average. Amount
AnnualAverageAmount.description: The average monetary amount of a task such as this completed task.

TotalTaskAmount.title: Completed Task. Total Task. Amount
TotalTaskAmount.description: The actual total monetary amount of this completed task.

PartyCapacityAmount.title: Completed Task. Party Capacity. Amount
PartyCapacityAmount.description: A monetary amount corresponding to the financial capacity of the party that carried out this completed task.

EvidenceSupplied.title: Completed Task. Evidence Supplied
EvidenceSupplied.description: The evidence justifying a designation of "complete" for this task.

Period.title: Completed Task. Period
Period.description: The period in which this completed task was performed.

RecipientCustomerParty.title: Completed Task. Recipient_ Customer Party. Customer Party
RecipientCustomerParty.description: The original customer for this completed task.

Condition.title: Condition. Details
Condition.description: A class to define a measurable condition of an object.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

AttributeID.title: Condition. Attribute Identifier. Identifier
AttributeID.description: An identifier for the attribute that applies to the condition.

Description.title: Condition. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing the attribute that applies to the condition.

MinimumMeasure.title: Condition. Minimum_ Measure. Measure
MinimumMeasure.description: The minimum value in a range of measurement for this condition.

MaximumMeasure.title: Condition. Maximum_ Measure. Measure
MaximumMeasure.description: The maximum value in a range of measurement for this condition.

Consignment.title: Consignment. Details
Consignment.description: A class to describe an identifiable collection of one or more goods items to be transported between the consignor and the consignee. This information may be defined within a transport contract. A consignment may comprise more than one shipment (e.g., when consolidated by a freight forwarder).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Consignment. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier assigned to a collection of goods for both import and export.

CarrierAssignedID.title: Consignment. Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
CarrierAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the carrier.

ConsigneeAssignedID.title: Consignment. Consignee Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
ConsigneeAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the consignee.

ConsignorAssignedID.title: Consignment. Consignor Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
ConsignorAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the consignor.

FreightForwarderAssignedID.title: Consignment. Freight Forwarder Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
FreightForwarderAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the freight forwarder.

BrokerAssignedID.title: Consignment. Broker Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
BrokerAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the broker.

ContractedCarrierAssignedID.title: Consignment. Contracted Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
ContractedCarrierAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the contracted carrier.

PerformingCarrierAssignedID.title: Consignment. Performing Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
PerformingCarrierAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the performing carrier.

SummaryDescription.title: Consignment. Summary_ Description. Text
SummaryDescription.description: A textual summary description of the consignment.

TotalInvoiceAmount.title: Consignment. Total_ Invoice Amount. Amount
TotalInvoiceAmount.description: The total of all invoice amounts declared in this consignment.

DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.title: Consignment. Declared Customs_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.description: The total declared value for customs purposes of all the goods in this consignment, regardless of whether they are subject to the same customs procedure, tariff/statistical categorization, country information, or duty regime.

TariffDescription.title: Consignment. Tariff Description. Text
TariffDescription.description: Text describing the tariff applied to this consignment.

TariffCode.title: Consignment. Tariff Code. Code
TariffCode.description: A code signifying the tariff applied to this consignment.

InsurancePremiumAmount.title: Consignment. Insurance Premium Amount. Amount
InsurancePremiumAmount.description: The amount of the premium payable to an insurance company for insuring the goods contained in this consignment.

GrossWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Gross_ Weight. Measure
GrossWeightMeasure.description: The total declared weight of the goods in this consignment, including packaging but excluding the carrier's equipment.

NetWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of all the goods items referred to as one consignment.

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of the goods in this consignment, exclusive of packaging.

ChargeableWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Chargeable_ Weight. Measure
ChargeableWeightMeasure.description: The weight upon which a charge is to be based.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Consignment. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods referred to as one consignment.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Consignment. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The total net volume of all goods items referred to as one consignment.

LoadingLengthMeasure.title: Consignment. Loading_ Length. Measure
LoadingLengthMeasure.description: The total length in a means of transport or a piece of transport equipment which, given the width and height of the transport means, will accommodate all of the consignments in a single consolidation.

Remarks.title: Consignment. Remarks. Text
Remarks.description: Remarks concerning the complete consignment, to be printed on the transport document.

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Consignment. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

AnimalFoodIndicator.title: Consignment. Animal_ Food Indicator. Indicator
AnimalFoodIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are animal foodstuffs (true) or not (false).

HumanFoodIndicator.title: Consignment. Human_ Food Indicator. Indicator
HumanFoodIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are for human consumption (true) or not (false).

LivestockIndicator.title: Consignment. Livestock_ Indicator. Indicator
LivestockIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods are livestock (true) or not (false).

BulkCargoIndicator.title: Consignment. Bulk Cargo_ Indicator. Indicator
BulkCargoIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are bulk cargoes (true) or not (false).

ContainerizedIndicator.title: Consignment. Containerized_ Indicator. Indicator
ContainerizedIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are containerized cargoes (true) or not (false).

GeneralCargoIndicator.title: Consignment. General Cargo_ Indicator. Indicator
GeneralCargoIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are general cargoes (true) or not (false).

SpecialSecurityIndicator.title: Consignment. Special_ Security Indicator. Indicator
SpecialSecurityIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment require special security (true) or not (false).

ThirdPartyPayerIndicator.title: Consignment. Third Party Payer_ Indicator. Indicator
ThirdPartyPayerIndicator.description: An indication that this consignment will be paid for by a third party (true) or not (false).

CarrierServiceInstructions.title: Consignment. Carrier Service_ Instructions. Text
CarrierServiceInstructions.description: Service instructions to the carrier, expressed as text.

CustomsClearanceServiceInstructions.title: Consignment. Customs Clearance Service_ Instructions. Text
CustomsClearanceServiceInstructions.description: Service instructions for customs clearance, expressed as text.

ForwarderServiceInstructions.title: Consignment. Forwarder Service_ Instructions. Text
ForwarderServiceInstructions.description: Service instructions for the forwarder, expressed as text.

SpecialServiceInstructions.title: Consignment. Special Service_ Instructions. Text
SpecialServiceInstructions.description: Special service instructions, expressed as text.

SequenceID.title: Consignment. Sequence Identifier. Identifier
SequenceID.description: A sequence identifier for this consignment.

ShippingPriorityLevelCode.title: Consignment. Shipping Priority Level Code. Code
ShippingPriorityLevelCode.description: A code signifying the priority or level of service required for this consignment.

HandlingCode.title: Consignment. Handling Code. Code
HandlingCode.description: The handling required for this consignment, expressed as a code.

HandlingInstructions.title: Consignment. Handling_ Instructions. Text
HandlingInstructions.description: The handling required for this consignment, expressed as text.

Information.title: Consignment. Information. Text
Information.description: Free-form text pertinent to this consignment, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

TotalGoodsItemQuantity.title: Consignment. Total_ Goods Item Quantity. Quantity
TotalGoodsItemQuantity.description: The total number of goods items in this consignment.

TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.title: Consignment. Total_ Transport Handling Unit Quantity. Quantity
TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.description: The number of pieces of transport handling equipment (pallets, boxes, cases, etc.) in this consignment.

InsuranceValueAmount.title: Consignment. Insurance_ Value. Amount
InsuranceValueAmount.description: The amount covered by insurance for this consignment.

DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.title: Consignment. Declared For Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.description: The value of this consignment, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.title: Consignment. Declared Statistics_ Value. Amount
DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.description: The value, declared for statistical purposes, of those goods in this consignment that have the same statistical heading.

FreeOnBoardValueAmount.title: Consignment. Free On Board_ Value. Amount
FreeOnBoardValueAmount.description: The monetary amount that has to be or has been paid as calculated under the applicable trade delivery.

SpecialInstructions.title: Consignment. Special_ Instructions. Text
SpecialInstructions.description: Special instructions relating to this consignment.

SplitConsignmentIndicator.title: Consignment. Split Consignment_ Indicator. Indicator
SplitConsignmentIndicator.description: An indicator that this consignment has been split in transit (true) or not (false).

DeliveryInstructions.title: Consignment. Delivery_ Instructions. Text
DeliveryInstructions.description: A set of delivery instructions relating to this consignment.

ConsignmentQuantity.title: Consignment. Consignment_ Quantity. Quantity
ConsignmentQuantity.description: The count in this consignment considering goods items, child consignments, shipments

ConsolidatableIndicator.title: Consignment. Consolidatable_ Indicator. Indicator
ConsolidatableIndicator.description: An indicator that this consignment can be consolidated (true) or not (false).

HaulageInstructions.title: Consignment. Haulage_ Instructions. Text
HaulageInstructions.description: Instructions regarding haulage of this consignment, expressed as text.

LoadingSequenceID.title: Consignment. Loading_ Sequence Identifier. Identifier
LoadingSequenceID.description: An identifier for the loading sequence of this consignment.

TotalPackagesQuantity.title: Consignment. Total_ Packages Quantity. Quantity
TotalPackagesQuantity.description: The total number of packages associated with a Consignment.

ConsolidatedShipment.title: Consignment. Consolidated_ Shipment. Shipment
ConsolidatedShipment.description: A consolidated shipment (a shipment created by an act of consolidation).

CustomsDeclaration.title: Consignment. Customs Declaration
CustomsDeclaration.description: A class describing identifiers or references relating to customs procedures.

RequestedPickupTransportEvent.title: Consignment. Requested Pickup_ Transport Event. Transport Event
RequestedPickupTransportEvent.description: The pickup of this consignment requested by the party requesting a transportation service (the transport user).

RequestedDeliveryTransportEvent.title: Consignment. Requested Delivery_ Transport Event. Transport Event
RequestedDeliveryTransportEvent.description: The delivery of this consignment requested by the party requesting a transportation service (the transport user).

PlannedPickupTransportEvent.title: Consignment. Planned Pickup_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedPickupTransportEvent.description: The pickup of this consignment planned by the party responsible for providing the transportation service (the transport service provider).

PlannedDeliveryTransportEvent.title: Consignment. Planned Delivery_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedDeliveryTransportEvent.description: The delivery of this consignment planned by the party responsible for providing the transportation service (the transport service provider).

ActualPickupTransportEvent.title: Consignment. Actual Pickup_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualPickupTransportEvent.description: The actual pickup of this consignment by the party responsible for providing the transportation service (the transport service provider).

ActualDeliveryTransportEvent.title: Consignment. Actual Delivery_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualDeliveryTransportEvent.description: The actual delivery of this consignment by the party responsible for providing the transportation service (the transport service provider).

Status.title: Consignment. Status
Status.description: The status of a particular condition associated with this consignment.

ChildConsignment.title: Consignment. Child_ Consignment. Consignment
ChildConsignment.description: One of the child consignments of which a consolidated consignment is composed.

ConsigneeParty.title: Consignment. Consignee_ Party. Party
ConsigneeParty.description: A party to which goods are consigned.

ExporterParty.title: Consignment. Exporter_ Party. Party
ExporterParty.description: The party that makes the export declaration, or on behalf of which the export declaration is made, and that is the owner of the goods in this consignment or has similar right of disposal over them at the time when the declaration is accepted.

ConsignorParty.title: Consignment. Consignor_ Party. Party
ConsignorParty.description: The party consigning goods, as stipulated in the transport contract by the party ordering transport.

ImporterParty.title: Consignment. Importer_ Party. Party
ImporterParty.description: The party that makes an import declaration regarding this consignment, or on behalf of which a customs clearing agent or other authorized person makes an import declaration regarding this consignment. This may include a person who has possession of the goods or to whom the goods are consigned.

CarrierParty.title: Consignment. Carrier_ Party. Party
CarrierParty.description: The party providing the transport of goods in this consignment between named points.

FreightForwarderParty.title: Consignment. Freight Forwarder_ Party. Party
FreightForwarderParty.description: The party combining individual smaller consignments into a single larger shipment (the consolidated shipment), which is sent to a counterpart that mirrors the consolidator's activity by dividing the consolidated consignment into its original components.

NotifyParty.title: Consignment. Notify_ Party. Party
NotifyParty.description: The party to be notified upon arrival of goods and when special occurrences (usually pre-defined) take place during a transportation service.

OriginalDespatchParty.title: Consignment. Original Despatch_ Party. Party
OriginalDespatchParty.description: The original despatch (sender) party for this consignment.

FinalDeliveryParty.title: Consignment. Final Delivery_ Party. Party
FinalDeliveryParty.description: The final delivery party for this consignment.

PerformingCarrierParty.title: Consignment. Performing Carrier_ Party. Party
PerformingCarrierParty.description: The party performing the carriage of this consignment.

SubstituteCarrierParty.title: Consignment. Substitute Carrier_ Party. Party
SubstituteCarrierParty.description: A substitute party performing the carriage of this consignment.

LogisticsOperatorParty.title: Consignment. Logistics Operator_ Party. Party
LogisticsOperatorParty.description: The logistics operator party for this consignment.

TransportAdvisorParty.title: Consignment. Transport Advisor_ Party. Party
TransportAdvisorParty.description: The party providing transport advice this consignment.

HazardousItemNotificationParty.title: Consignment. Hazardous Item Notification_ Party. Party
HazardousItemNotificationParty.description: The party that would be notified of a hazardous item in this consignment.

InsuranceParty.title: Consignment. Insurance_ Party. Party
InsuranceParty.description: The party holding the insurance for this consignment.

MortgageHolderParty.title: Consignment. Mortgage Holder_ Party. Party
MortgageHolderParty.description: The party holding the mortgage for this consignment.

BillOfLadingHolderParty.title: Consignment. Bill Of Lading Holder_ Party. Party
BillOfLadingHolderParty.description: The party holding the bill of lading for this consignment.

OriginalDepartureCountry.title: Consignment. Original Departure_ Country. Country
OriginalDepartureCountry.description: The country from which the goods in this consignment were originally exported, without any commercial transaction taking place in intermediate countries.

FinalDestinationCountry.title: Consignment. Final Destination_ Country. Country
FinalDestinationCountry.description: The country in which the goods in this consignment are to be delivered to the final consignee or buyer.

TransitCountry.title: Consignment. Transit_ Country. Country
TransitCountry.description: One of the countries through which goods or passengers in this consignment are routed between the country of original departure and the country of final destination.

TransportContract.title: Consignment. Transport_ Contract. Contract
TransportContract.description: A transport contract relating to this consignment.

TransportEvent.title: Consignment. Transport Event
TransportEvent.description: A class describing a significant occurrence or happening related to the transportation of goods.

OriginalDespatchTransportationService.title: Consignment. Original Despatch_ Transportation Service. Transportation Service
OriginalDespatchTransportationService.description: The service for pickup from the consignor under the transport contract for this consignment.

FinalDeliveryTransportationService.title: Consignment. Final Delivery_ Transportation Service. Transportation Service
FinalDeliveryTransportationService.description: The service for delivery to the consignee under the transport contract for this consignment.

DeliveryTerms.title: Consignment. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: The conditions agreed upon between a seller and a buyer with regard to the delivery of goods and/or services (e.g., CIF, FOB, or EXW from the INCOTERMS Terms of Delivery).

PaymentTerms.title: Consignment. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: The terms of payment between the parties (such as logistics service client, logistics service provider) in a transaction.

CollectPaymentTerms.title: Consignment. Collect_ Payment Terms. Payment Terms
CollectPaymentTerms.description: The terms of payment that apply to the collection of this consignment.

DisbursementPaymentTerms.title: Consignment. Disbursement_ Payment Terms. Payment Terms
DisbursementPaymentTerms.description: The terms of payment for disbursement.

PrepaidPaymentTerms.title: Consignment. Prepaid_ Payment Terms. Payment Terms
PrepaidPaymentTerms.description: The terms of payment for prepayment.

FreightAllowanceCharge.title: Consignment. Freight_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge
FreightAllowanceCharge.description: A cost incurred by the shipper in moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another under the terms of the contract of carriage for this consignment. In addition to transport costs, this may include such elements as packing, documentation, loading, unloading, and insurance to the extent that they relate to the freight costs.

ExtraAllowanceCharge.title: Consignment. Extra_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge

MainCarriageShipmentStage.title: Consignment. Main Carriage_ Shipment Stage. Shipment Stage
MainCarriageShipmentStage.description: A shipment stage during main carriage.

PreCarriageShipmentStage.title: Consignment. Pre Carriage_ Shipment Stage. Shipment Stage
PreCarriageShipmentStage.description: A shipment stage during precarriage (usually refers to movement activity that takes place prior to the container being loaded at a port of loading).

OnCarriageShipmentStage.title: Consignment. On Carriage_ Shipment Stage. Shipment Stage
OnCarriageShipmentStage.description: A shipment stage during on-carriage (usually refers to movement activity that takes place after the container is discharged at a port of discharge).

TransportHandlingUnit.title: Consignment. Transport Handling Unit
TransportHandlingUnit.description: A transport handling unit used for loose and containerized goods.

FirstArrivalPortLocation.title: Consignment. First Arrival Port_ Location. Location
FirstArrivalPortLocation.description: The first arrival location in a transport. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.

LastExitPortLocation.title: Consignment. Last Exit Port_ Location. Location
LastExitPortLocation.description: The final exporting location in a transport. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.

OfficeOfEntryLocation.title: Consignment. Office Of Entry_ Location. Location
OfficeOfEntryLocation.description: The location of the office of entry of this consignment.

OfficeOfSubSequentiallyEntryLocation.title: Consignment. Office Of Sub Sequentially Entry_ Location. Location
OfficeOfSubSequentiallyEntryLocation.description: The location of the office of the subsequentially entry of this consignment.

OfficeOfExitLocation.title: Consignment. Office Of Exit_ Location. Location
OfficeOfExitLocation.description: The location of the office of exit of this consignment.

OfficeOfDepartureLocation.title: Consignment. Office Of Departure_ Location. Location
OfficeOfDepartureLocation.description: The location of the office of departure of this consignment.

OfficeOfDestinationLocation.title: Consignment. Office Of Destination_ Location. Location
OfficeOfDestinationLocation.description: The location of the office of destination of this consignment.

OfficeOfImportLocation.title: Consignment. Office Of Import_ Location. Location
OfficeOfImportLocation.description: The location of the office of import of this consignment.

OfficeOfExportLocation.title: Consignment. Office Of Export_ Location. Location
OfficeOfExportLocation.description: The location of the office of export of this consignment.

DocumentReference.title: Consignment. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document related to or relevant for this consignment.

Consumption.title: Consumption. Details
Consumption.description: A class to describe the consumption of a utility.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UtilityStatementTypeCode.title: Consumption. Utility Statement Type Code. Code
UtilityStatementTypeCode.description: A code identifying the type of the Utility Statement required for this consumption. Explains the kind of utility the statement is about, e.g.. "gas", "electricity", "telephone"

AllowanceCharge.title: Consumption. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: An allowance or charges that may apply with this consumption.

TaxTotal.title: Consumption. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total of taxes for each tax type covering the consumption.

EnergyWaterSupply.title: Consumption. Energy Water Supply
EnergyWaterSupply.description: The details of any energy or water consumption.

TelecommunicationsSupply.title: Consumption. Telecommunications Supply
TelecommunicationsSupply.description: The details of any telecommunications consumption.

LegalMonetaryTotal.title: Consumption. Legal_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
LegalMonetaryTotal.description: The total amount payable on this consumption, including any allowances, charges, or taxes.

ConsumptionAverage.title: Consumption Average. Details
ConsumptionAverage.description: A class to define an average consumption as a monetary amount.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

AverageAmount.title: Consumption Average. Average_ Amount. Amount
AverageAmount.description: The average monetary amount of the consumption.

Description.title: Consumption Average. Description. Text
Description.description: A description of the average consumed.

ConsumptionCorrection.title: Consumption Correction. Details
ConsumptionCorrection.description: The Statement of correction, for examples heating correction.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

CorrectionTypeCode.title: Consumption Correction. Correction Type Code. Code
CorrectionTypeCode.description: Statement at the code for the correction type.

ActualTemperatureReductionQuantity.title: Consumption Correction. Actual_ Temperature Reduction. Quantity
ActualTemperatureReductionQuantity.description: Statement for the actuel heating correction temperature.

NormalTemperatureReductionQuantity.title: Consumption Correction. Normal_ Temperature Reduction. Quantity
NormalTemperatureReductionQuantity.description: Statement for the standard for heating correction temperature.

DifferenceTemperatureReductionQuantity.title: Consumption Correction. Difference_ Temperature Reduction. Quantity

CorrectionUnitAmount.title: Consumption Correction. Correction Unit Amount. Amount
CorrectionUnitAmount.description: Correction per MWH per degree C.

ConsumptionEnergyQuantity.title: Consumption Correction. Consumption Energy. Quantity
ConsumptionEnergyQuantity.description: Your consumpt for district heating energy.

ConsumptionWaterQuantity.title: Consumption Correction. Consumption Water. Quantity
ConsumptionWaterQuantity.description: Your consumpt for district heating water.

ConsumptionHistory.title: Consumption History. Details
ConsumptionHistory.description: A class to describe the measurement of a type of consumption during a particular period, used for the subscriber to get an overview of his consumption

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

MeterNumber.title: Consumption History. Meter Number. Text
MeterNumber.description: A text identifier for the meter measuring the consumption.

Quantity.title: Consumption History. Quantity
Quantity.description: The quantity consumed.

Amount.title: Consumption History. Amount
Amount.description: The monetary amount to be charged for the quantity consumed.

ConsumptionLevelCode.title: Consumption History. Consumption Level Code. Code
ConsumptionLevelCode.description: The consumption level, expressed as a code used explain the consumption quantity, e.g.. diversion from the normal.

ConsumptionLevel.title: Consumption History. Consumption Level Text. Text
ConsumptionLevel.description: The consumption level, expressed as text, used explain the consumption quantity, e.g.. diversion from the normal.

Period.title: Consumption History. Period
Period.description: The period during which the consumption took place.

ConsumptionLine.title: Consumption Line. Details
ConsumptionLine.description: A class to describe a line item for utility consumption. To specify more than one utility item, use separate consumption lines.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Consumption Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this consumption line.

ParentDocumentLineReferenceID.title: Consumption Line. Parent_ Document Line Reference Identifier. Identifier
ParentDocumentLineReferenceID.description: An identifier for the transaction line on a related document (such as an invoice) that covers this consumption line.

LineExtensionAmount.title: Consumption Line. Line Extension Amount. Amount
LineExtensionAmount.description: The monetary amount, including discount, to be charged for this consumption line.

TaxInclusiveLineExtensionAmount.title: Consumption Line. Tax Inclusive_ Line Extension Amount. Amount
TaxInclusiveLineExtensionAmount.description: The total amount for this consumption line, including all allowances, charges and taxes.

Period.title: Consumption Line. Period
Period.description: The period of time covered by this consumption line.

Delivery.title: Consumption Line. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery of the utility item on this consumption line.

AllowanceCharge.title: Consumption Line. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: An allowance or charge that applies to this consumption line.

TaxTotal.title: Consumption Line. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: A total amount of taxes of a particular kind applicable to this consumption line.

Price.title: Consumption Line. Price
Price.description: The price associated with this consumption line, expressed in a data structure containing multiple properties.

UnstructuredPrice.title: Consumption Line. Unstructured Price
UnstructuredPrice.description: The price associated with this consumption line expressed in a less structured form that includes just the amount and the time of use.

ConsumptionPoint.title: Consumption Point. Details
ConsumptionPoint.description: A class to define the point of consumption for a utility, such as a meter.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Consumption Point. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this point of consumption.

SubscriberID.title: Consumption Point. Subscriber Identifier. Identifier
SubscriberID.description: An identifier for the subscriber responsible for the consumption at this consumption point.

SubscriberType.title: Consumption Point. Subscriber Type. Text
SubscriberType.description: The type of subscriber, expressed as text.

SubscriberTypeCode.title: Consumption Point. Subscriber Type Code. Code
SubscriberTypeCode.description: The type of subscriber, expressed as a code.

TotalDeliveredQuantity.title: Consumption Point. Total_ Delivered Quantity. Quantity
TotalDeliveredQuantity.description: The total quantity delivered, calculated at this consumption point.

Address.title: Consumption Point. Address
Address.description: The address of this consumption point.

WebSiteAccess.title: Consumption Point. Web Site Access
WebSiteAccess.description: Access information for the website of this consumption point.

UtilityMeter.title: Consumption Point. Utility_ Meter. Meter
UtilityMeter.description: A meter at this consumption point.

ConsumptionReport.title: Consumption Report. Details
ConsumptionReport.description: A class to describe utility consumption, including details of the environment in which consumption takes place.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Consumption Report. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this consumption report.

ConsumptionType.title: Consumption Report. Consumption Type. Text
ConsumptionType.description: The type of consumption, expressed as text.

ConsumptionTypeCode.title: Consumption Report. Consumption Type Code. Code
ConsumptionTypeCode.description: The type of consumption, expressed as a code.

TotalConsumedQuantity.title: Consumption Report. Total_ Consumed Quantity. Quantity

BasicConsumedQuantity.title: Consumption Report. Basic_ Consumed Quantity. Quantity
BasicConsumedQuantity.description: The basic quantity consumed, excluding additional consumption.

ResidentOccupantsNumeric.title: Consumption Report. Resident_ Occupants Numeric. Numeric
ResidentOccupantsNumeric.description: The number of people occupying the residence covered by this report.

ConsumersEnergyLevelCode.title: Consumption Report. Consumers_ Energy Level Code. Code
ConsumersEnergyLevelCode.description: The level of energy consumed, compared to the average for this residence type and the number of people living in the residence, expressed as a code.

ConsumersEnergyLevel.title: Consumption Report. Consumers_ Energy Level. Text
ConsumersEnergyLevel.description: The level of energy consumed, compared to the average for this residence type and the number of people living in the residence, expressed as text.

ResidenceType.title: Consumption Report. Residence Type. Text
ResidenceType.description: The type of residence (house, apartment, etc.) covered in this report, expressed as text.

ResidenceTypeCode.title: Consumption Report. Residence Type Code. Code
ResidenceTypeCode.description: The type of residence (house, apartment, etc.) covered in this report, expressed as a code.

HeatingType.title: Consumption Report. Heating Type. Text
HeatingType.description: The type of heating in the residence covered in this report, expressed as text.

HeatingTypeCode.title: Consumption Report. Heating Type Code. Code
HeatingTypeCode.description: The type of heating in the residence covered in this report, expressed as a code.

Period.title: Consumption Report. Period
Period.description: The period of consumption covered in this report.

GuidanceDocumentReference.title: Consumption Report. Guidance_ Document Reference. Document Reference
GuidanceDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document providing an explanation of this kind of report.

DocumentReference.title: Consumption Report. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to some other document (for example, this report in another format).

ConsumptionReportReference.title: Consumption Report. Consumption Report Reference
ConsumptionReportReference.description: A reference to a previous consumption report.

ConsumptionHistory.title: Consumption Report. Consumption History
ConsumptionHistory.description: A report describing historical parameters relating to a specific instance of consumption.

ConsumptionReportReference.title: Consumption Report Reference. Details
ConsumptionReportReference.description: A class to define a reference to an earlier consumption report (e.g., last year's consumption).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ConsumptionReportID.title: Consumption Report Reference. Consumption_ Report Identifier. Identifier
ConsumptionReportID.description: An identifier for the referenced consumption report.

ConsumptionType.title: Consumption Report Reference. Consumption Type. Text
ConsumptionType.description: The reported consumption type, expressed as text.

ConsumptionTypeCode.title: Consumption Report Reference. Consumption Type Code. Code
ConsumptionTypeCode.description: The reported consumption type, expressed as a code.

TotalConsumedQuantity.title: Consumption Report Reference. Total_ Consumed Quantity. Quantity
TotalConsumedQuantity.description: The total quantity consumed during the period of the referenced report.

Period.title: Consumption Report Reference. Period
Period.description: The period of consumption covered by the referenced report.

Contact.title: Contact. Details
Contact.description: A class to describe a contactable person or department in an organization.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Contact. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this contact.

Name.title: Contact. Name
Name.description: The name of this contact. It is recommended that this be used for a functional name and not a personal name.

JobTitle.title: Contact. Job_ Title. Text
JobTitle.description: The job title or function of this contact

Department.title: Contact. Department. Text
Department.description: The department where this contact works

Telephone.title: Contact. Telephone. Text
Telephone.description: The primary telephone number of this contact.

Telefax.title: Contact. Telefax. Text
Telefax.description: The primary fax number of this contact.

ElectronicMail.title: Contact. Electronic_ Mail. Text
ElectronicMail.description: The primary email address of this contact.

Note.title: Contact. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures; in particular, a textual description of the circumstances under which this contact can be used (e.g., "emergency" or "after hours").

OtherCommunication.title: Contact. Other_ Communication. Communication
OtherCommunication.description: Another means of communication with this contact.

Contract.title: Contract. Details
Contract.description: A class to describe a contract.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Contract. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this contract.

IssueDate.title: Contract. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date on which this contract was issued.

IssueTime.title: Contract. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time at which this contract was issued.

NominationDate.title: Contract. Nomination Date. Date
NominationDate.description: In a transportation contract, the deadline date by which the services referred to in the transport execution plan have to be booked. For example, if this service is a carrier service scheduled for Wednesday 16 February 2011 at 10 a.m. CET, the nomination date might be Tuesday15 February 2011.

NominationTime.title: Contract. Nomination Time. Time
NominationTime.description: In a transportation contract, the deadline time by which the services referred to in the transport execution plan have to be booked. For example, if this service is a carrier service scheduled for Wednesday 16 February 2011 at 10 a.m. CET, the nomination date might be Tuesday15 February 2011 and the nomination time 4 p.m. at the latest.

ContractTypeCode.title: Contract. Contract Type Code. Code
ContractTypeCode.description: The type of this contract, expressed as a code, such as "Cost plus award fee" and "Cost plus fixed fee" from UNCEFACT Contract Type code list.

ContractType.title: Contract. Contract Type. Text
ContractType.description: The type of this contract, expressed as text, such as "Cost plus award fee" and "Cost plus fixed fee" from UNCEFACT Contract Type code list.

Note.title: Contract. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Contract. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: An identifier for the current version of this contract.

ModificationReasonCode.title: Contract. Modification_ Reason Code. Code
ModificationReasonCode.description: The main reason for modifying the contract expressed as a code.

ModificationReasonDescription.title: Contract. Modification_ Reason Description. Text
ModificationReasonDescription.description: Text describing the main reason for modifying the contract

ValidityPeriod.title: Contract. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period during which this contract is valid.

ContractDocumentReference.title: Contract. Contract_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ContractDocumentReference.description: A reference to a contract document.

NominationPeriod.title: Contract. Nomination_ Period. Period
NominationPeriod.description: In a transportation contract, the period required to book the services specified in the contract before the services can begin.

ContractualDelivery.title: Contract. Contractual_ Delivery. Delivery
ContractualDelivery.description: In a transportation contract, the delivery of the services required to book the services specified in the contract.

ContractExecutionRequirement.title: Contract Execution Requirement. Details
ContractExecutionRequirement.description: A class to describe a requirement for execution of a contract.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Name.title: Contract Execution Requirement. Name
Name.description: A name for this requirement.

ExecutionRequirementCode.title: Contract Execution Requirement. Execution Requirement Code. Code
ExecutionRequirementCode.description: A code signifying a type of requirement to be fulfiled by the economic operator.

ContractExtension.title: Contract Extension. Details
ContractExtension.description: A class to describe possible extensions to a contract.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

OptionsDescription.title: Contract Extension. Options Description. Text
OptionsDescription.description: A description for the possible options that can be carried out during the execution of the contract.

MinimumNumberNumeric.title: Contract Extension. Minimum_ Number. Numeric
MinimumNumberNumeric.description: The fixed minimum number of contract extensions or renewals.

MaximumNumberNumeric.title: Contract Extension. Maximum_ Number. Numeric
MaximumNumberNumeric.description: The maximum allowed number of contract extensions.

RenewalsIndicator.title: Contract Extension. Renewals. Indicator
RenewalsIndicator.description: Indicates that the contract can be extended using renewals.

OptionValidityPeriod.title: Contract Extension. Option Validity_ Period. Period
OptionValidityPeriod.description: The period during which the option for extending the contract is available.

Renewal.title: Contract Extension. Renewal
Renewal.description: The period allowed for each contract extension.

ContractingActivity.title: Contracting Activity. Details
ContractingActivity.description: The nature of the type of business of the organization.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ActivityTypeCode.title: Contracting Activity. Activity Type Code. Code
ActivityTypeCode.description: A code specifying the nature of the type of business of the organization.

ActivityType.title: Contracting Activity. Activity Type. Text
ActivityType.description: The nature of the type of business of the organization, expressed as text.

ContractingParty.title: Contracting Party. Details
ContractingParty.description: A class to describe an individual, a group, or a body having a procurement role in a tendering process.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

BuyerProfileURI.title: Contracting Party. Buyer Profile_ URI. Identifier
BuyerProfileURI.description: The buyer profile is typically located on a web site where the contracting party publishes its procurement opportunities

ContractingPartyType.title: Contracting Party. Contracting Party Type

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Exception Criteria Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this exception criteria line.

Note.title: Exception Criteria Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

ThresholdValueComparisonCode.title: Exception Criteria Line. Threshold Value Comparison Code. Code
ThresholdValueComparisonCode.description: Type of comparison to be carried out in reference to the set threshold." Allowed values are: EXCEEDS_EXCEPTION_VALUE FALLS_BELOW_EXCEPTION_VALUE

ThresholdQuantity.description: A quantity beyond which an exception will be triggered.

ExceptionStatusCode.title: Exception Criteria Line. Exception Status Code. Code

ExceptionResolutionCode.description: Coded representation of possible resolution methods". Possible values are: DEFAULT_TO_AVERAGE_OF_COMPARED_VALUES DEFAULT_TO_BUYERS_VALUE DEFAULT_TO_HIGH_VALUE DEFAULT_TO_LOW_VALUE DEFAULT_TO_SELLERS_VALUE MANUAL_RESOLUTION MUTUALLY_DEFINED

SupplyChainActivityTypeCode.title: Exception Criteria Line. Supply Chain Activity Type Code. Code
SupplyChainActivityTypeCode.description: Establishes the criterion for one of the three types of exceptions. There can be three types of exception criteria: Operational, Metric and Forecast Exceptions. This will be set if this Exception is about an Operational Exception. Description could be: A code used to identify an operational exception. Possible values are: CANCELED_ORDERS EMERGENCY_ORDERS ON_HAND ORDERS RECEIPTS SALES SHIPMENTS

PerformanceMetricTypeCode.title: Exception Criteria Line. Performance Metric Type Code. Code
PerformanceMetricTypeCode.description: A code signifying a measure of performance.

EffectivePeriod.title: Exception Criteria Line. Effective_ Period. Period
EffectivePeriod.description: The period during which this exception criteria line is in effect.

SupplyItem.title: Exception Criteria Line. Supply_ Item. Item
SupplyItem.description: The Trade Item that is the subject of the Exception Criterion.

ForecastExceptionCriterionLine.title: Exception Criteria Line. Forecast Exception Criterion Line
ForecastExceptionCriterionLine.description: Establishes the criterion for one of the three types of exceptions. This class provides the criterion for the kind of forecast exception, the identification of the purpose of the forecast, the source of data and the time basis criterion for the exception.

ExceptionNotificationLine.title: Exception Notification Line. Details
ExceptionNotificationLine.description: A class to define a line in an Exception Notification.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

ExceptionStatusCode.title: Exception Notification Line. Exception Status Code. Code
ExceptionStatusCode.description: A code signifying status specific to a shipment exception.

CollaborationPriorityCode.title: Exception Notification Line. Collaboration_ Priority Code. Code

ResolutionCode.title: Exception Notification Line. Resolution Code. Code
ResolutionCode.description: Coded representation of possible resolution methods". Possible values are: DEFAULT_TO_AVERAGE_OF_COMPARED_VALUES DEFAULT_TO_BUYERS_VALUE DEFAULT_TO_HIGH_VALUE DEFAULT_TO_LOW_VALUE DEFAULT_TO_SELLERS_VALUE MANUAL_RESOLUTION MUTUALLY_DEFINED

SourceValueMeasure.title: Exception Notification Line. Source Value. Measure
SourceValueMeasure.description: The value used as the basis of comparison

VarianceQuantity.description: The variance of a data item from an expected value during a particular time interval.

SupplyChainActivityTypeCode.title: Exception Notification Line. Supply Chain Activity Type Code. Code
SupplyChainActivityTypeCode.description: Establishes the criterion for one of the three types of exceptions: Operational, performance metric and forecast. This reports an exception notification about an operational exception. Description could be: A code used to identify an operational exception. Possible values are: CANCELED_ORDERS EMERGENCY_ORDERS ON_HAND ORDERS RECEIPTS SALES SHIPMENTS

PerformanceMetricTypeCode.description: A code used to identify a measure of performance. It defines the type of the Performance Metric on which an exception criteria is being defined

ExceptionObservationPeriod.description: The period (start-end date) when this exception is observed

SupplyItem.description: The product associated with this exception notification line.
