Country.description: The country in which the holder of the financial account is domiciled.

FinancialGuarantee.title: Financial Guarantee. Details
FinancialGuarantee.description: A class to describe the bond guarantee of a tenderer or bid submitter's actual entry into a contract in the event that it is the successful bidder.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

GuaranteeTypeCode.title: Financial Guarantee. Guarantee Type Code. Code
GuaranteeTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of financial guarantee. For instance "Provisional Guarantee" or "Final Guarantee"

LiabilityAmount.title: Financial Guarantee. Liability. Amount
LiabilityAmount.description: The amount of liability in this financial guarantee.

AmountRate.title: Financial Guarantee. Amount. Rate
AmountRate.description: The rate used to calculate the amount of liability in this financial guarantee.

ConstitutionPeriod.title: Financial Guarantee. Constitution_ Period. Period
ConstitutionPeriod.description: The period during the tendering process to which this financial guarantee has to be settled.

FinancialInstitution.title: Financial Institution. Details
FinancialInstitution.description: A class to describe a financial institution.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Financial Institution. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this financial institution. It is recommended that the ISO 9362 Bank Identification Code (BIC) be used as the ID.

Name.title: Financial Institution. Name
Name.description: The name of this financial institution.

Address.title: Financial Institution. Address
Address.description: The address of this financial institution.

ForecastException.title: Forecast Exception. Details
ForecastException.description: As explained in Exception Criteria Line: Three types of exception criteria can be defined, Operational, Metric or Forecast Exceptions. This class provides criteria for forecast exception type: the identification of the purpose of the forecast, the source of data and the time basis criteria for the exception.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ForecastPurposeCode.title: Forecast Exception. Forecast_ Purpose Code. Code
ForecastPurposeCode.description: It is either Sales forecast or Order Forecast. Definition can be changed like: "The purpose of the Forecast (either sales or order), about which an exception criteria is being defined".

ForecastTypeCode.title: Forecast Exception. Forecast Type Code. Code
ForecastTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of forecast. Example of values are:BASE PROMOTIONAL SEASONAL TOTAL

IssueDate.title: Forecast Exception. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date on which the forecast was issued.

IssueTime.title: Forecast Exception. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time at which the forecast was issued.

DataSourceCode.title: Forecast Exception. Data Source Code. Code
DataSourceCode.description: A code signifying the partner who provides this information.

ComparisonDataCode.title: Forecast Exception. Comparison Data Code. Code
ComparisonDataCode.description: A code signifying the partner providing the information in this forecast exception.

ComparisonForecastIssueTime.title: Forecast Exception. Comparison Forecast Issue Time. Time
ComparisonForecastIssueTime.description: The time at which this comparison forecast was issued.

ComparisonForecastIssueDate.title: Forecast Exception. Comparison Forecast Issue Date. Date
ComparisonForecastIssueDate.description: The date on which this comparison forecast was issued.

ForecastExceptionCriterionLine.title: Forecast Exception Criterion Line. Details
ForecastExceptionCriterionLine.description: Establishes the criterion for one of the three types of exceptions. This class provides criteria for the kind of forecast exception, the identification of the purpose of the forecast, the source of data and the time basis criterion for the exception.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ForecastPurposeCode.title: Forecast Exception Criterion Line. Forecast_ Purpose Code. Code
ForecastPurposeCode.description: A description of the purpose for the forecast that is assigned to each forecast data item exception criterion.

ForecastTypeCode.title: Forecast Exception Criterion Line. Forecast Type Code. Code
ForecastTypeCode.description: A description of a Forecast selected from a list.

ComparisonDataSourceCode.title: Forecast Exception Criterion Line. Comparison Data Source Code. Code
ComparisonDataSourceCode.description: If it is a forecast comparison exception, this value indicates the other source of information.

DataSourceCode.title: Forecast Exception Criterion Line. Data Source Code. Code
DataSourceCode.description: Indication of the partner who provides the information.

TimeDeltaDaysQuantity.title: Forecast Exception Criterion Line. Time Delta Days Quantity. Quantity
TimeDeltaDaysQuantity.description: Time basis in days for the Exception.

ForecastLine.title: Forecast Line. Details
ForecastLine.description: Detailed information about a particular Forecast Line within a Forecast Document

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Forecast Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this forecast line.

Note.title: Forecast Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

FrozenDocumentIndicator.title: Forecast Line. Frozen Document Indicator. Indicator
FrozenDocumentIndicator.description: An indicator that the status of the forecast is modifiable (true) or not (false).

ForecastTypeCode.title: Forecast Line. Forecast Type Code. Code
ForecastTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of forecast. Examples: BASE PROMOTIONAL SEASONAL TOTAL

ForecastPeriod.title: Forecast Line. Forecast_ Period. Period
ForecastPeriod.description: The period to which the forecast applies.

SalesItem.title: Forecast Line. Sales Item
SalesItem.description: Sales information for the item to which this line applies.

ForecastRevisionLine.title: Forecast Revision Line. Details
ForecastRevisionLine.description: A class to define a line in a Forecast Revision describing a revision to a line in a Forecast.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Forecast Revision Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this forecast revision line.

Note.title: Forecast Revision Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Description.title: Forecast Revision Line. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing the revision to this line.

RevisedForecastLineID.title: Forecast Revision Line. Revised_ Forecast Line Identifier. Identifier
RevisedForecastLineID.description: An identifier for the revised forecast line.

SourceForecastIssueDate.title: Forecast Revision Line. Source Forecast_ Issue Date. Date
SourceForecastIssueDate.description: The date on which the forecast modified by this revision was generated or created.

SourceForecastIssueTime.title: Forecast Revision Line. Source Forecast_ Issue Time. Time
SourceForecastIssueTime.description: The time at which the forecast modified by this revision was generated or created.

AdjustmentReasonCode.title: Forecast Revision Line. Adjustment Reason Code. Code
AdjustmentReasonCode.description: A code signifying the reason for the adjustment specified in this forecast revision line.

ForecastPeriod.title: Forecast Revision Line. Forecast_ Period. Period
ForecastPeriod.description: The period to which this forecast revision line applies.

SalesItem.title: Forecast Revision Line. Sales Item
SalesItem.description: Sales information for the item to which this line applies.

FrameworkAgreement.title: Framework Agreement. Details
FrameworkAgreement.description: A class to describe a tendering framework agreement.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ExpectedOperatorQuantity.title: Framework Agreement. Expected_ Operator. Quantity
ExpectedOperatorQuantity.description: The number of economic operators expected to participate in this framework agreement.

MaximumOperatorQuantity.title: Framework Agreement. Maximum_ Operator. Quantity
MaximumOperatorQuantity.description: The maximum number of economic operators allowed to participate in this framework agreement.

Justification.title: Framework Agreement. Justification. Text
Justification.description: Text describing the justification for this framework agreement.

Frequency.title: Framework Agreement. Frequency. Text
Frequency.description: Text describing the frequency with which subsequent contracts will be awarded.

EstimatedMaximumValueAmount.title: Framework Agreement. Estimated Maximum_ Value. Amount
EstimatedMaximumValueAmount.description: The estimated value which will be spent within a framework agreement over its whole duration, including options and renewals.

MaximumValueAmount.title: Framework Agreement. Maximum_ Value. Amount
MaximumValueAmount.description: The maximum Value which can be spent within a framework agreement over its whole duration, including options and renewals.

DurationPeriod.title: Framework Agreement. Duration_ Period. Period
DurationPeriod.description: The period during which this framework agreement applies.

SubsequentProcessTenderRequirement.title: Framework Agreement. Subsequent Process_ Tender Requirement. Tender Requirement
SubsequentProcessTenderRequirement.description: A tender requirement intended for consumption by downstream tendering processes derived from the establishment of this framework agreement.

GoodsItem.title: Goods Item. Details
GoodsItem.description: A class to describe a separately identifiable quantity of goods of a single product type.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Goods Item. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this goods item.

SequenceNumberID.title: Goods Item. Sequence Number. Identifier
SequenceNumberID.description: A sequence number differentiating a specific goods item within a consignment.

Description.title: Goods Item. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing this goods item to identify it for customs, statistical, or transport purposes.

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Goods Item. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods item is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Declared Customs_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.description: The total declared value for customs purposes of the goods item.

DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Declared For Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.description: The value of this goods item, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Declared Statistics_ Value. Amount
DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.description: The total declared value of all the goods items in the same consignment with this goods item that have the same statistical heading.

FreeOnBoardValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Free On Board_ Value. Amount
FreeOnBoardValueAmount.description: The monetary amount that has to be or has been paid as calculated under the applicable trade delivery.

InsuranceValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Insurance_ Value. Amount
InsuranceValueAmount.description: The amount covered by insurance for this goods item.

ValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Value. Amount
ValueAmount.description: The amount on which a duty, tax, or fee will be assessed.

GrossWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Gross_ Weight. Measure
GrossWeightMeasure.description: The weight of this goods item, including packing and packaging but excluding the carrier's equipment.

NetWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The weight of this goods item, excluding packing but including packaging that normally accompanies the goods.

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total weight of this goods item, excluding all packing and packaging.

ChargeableWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Chargeable_ Weight. Measure
ChargeableWeightMeasure.description: The weight on which a charge is to be based.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Goods Item. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The volume of this goods item, normally calculated by multiplying its maximum length, width, and height.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Goods Item. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The volume contained by a goods item, excluding the volume of any packaging material.

Quantity.title: Goods Item. Quantity
Quantity.description: The number of units making up this goods item.

PreferenceCriterionCode.title: Goods Item. Preference Criterion Code. Code
PreferenceCriterionCode.description: A code signifying the treatment preference for this goods item according to international trading agreements.

RequiredCustomsID.title: Goods Item. Required_ Customs Identifier. Identifier
RequiredCustomsID.description: An identifier for a set of tariff codes required to specify a type of goods for customs, transport, statistical, or other regulatory purposes.

CustomsStatusCode.title: Goods Item. Customs Status Code. Code
CustomsStatusCode.description: A code assigned by customs to signify the status of this goods item.

CustomsProcedureCode.title: Goods Item. Customs Procedure Code. Code
CustomsProcedureCode.description: A code assigned by customs to signifying the customs procedure applied to this Goods Item.

CustomsTariffQuantity.title: Goods Item. Customs Tariff Quantity. Quantity
CustomsTariffQuantity.description: Quantity of the units in this goods item as required by customs for tariff, statistical, or fiscal purposes.

CustomsImportClassifiedIndicator.title: Goods Item. Customs Import_ Classified Indicator. Indicator
CustomsImportClassifiedIndicator.description: An indicator that this goods item has been classified for import by customs (true) or not (false).

ChargeableQuantity.title: Goods Item. Chargeable_ Quantity. Quantity
ChargeableQuantity.description: The number of units in the goods item to which charges apply.

ReturnableQuantity.title: Goods Item. Returnable_ Quantity. Quantity
ReturnableQuantity.description: The number of units in the goods item that may be returned.

TraceID.title: Goods Item. Trace_ Identifier. Identifier
TraceID.description: An identifier for use in tracing this goods item, such as the EPC number used in RFID.

Item.title: Goods Item. Item
Item.description: Product information relating to a goods item.

GoodsItemContainer.title: Goods Item. Goods Item Container
GoodsItemContainer.description: The transporting of a goods item in a unit of transport equipment (e.g., container).

FreightAllowanceCharge.title: Goods Item. Freight_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge
FreightAllowanceCharge.description: A cost incurred by the shipper in moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another under the terms of the contract of carriage. In addition to transport costs, this may include such elements as packing, documentation, loading, unloading, and insurance to the extent that they relate to the freight costs.

InvoiceLine.title: Goods Item. Invoice Line
InvoiceLine.description: Information about an invoice line relating to this goods item.

OrderLineReference.title: Goods Item. Order Line Reference
OrderLineReference.description: A reference to an order line associated with this goods item.

Temperature.title: Goods Item. Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature of the goods item.

ContainedGoodsItem.title: Goods Item. Contained_ Goods Item. Goods Item
ContainedGoodsItem.description: A goods item contained in this goods item.

OriginAddress.title: Goods Item. Origin_ Address. Address
OriginAddress.description: The region in which the goods have been produced or manufactured, according to criteria laid down for the purposes of application of the customs tariff, or of quantitative restrictions, or of any other measure related to trade.

Delivery.title: Goods Item. Delivery
Delivery.description: The delivery of this goods item.

Pickup.title: Goods Item. Pickup
Pickup.description: The pickup of this goods item.

Despatch.title: Goods Item. Despatch
Despatch.description: The despatch of this goods item.

MeasurementDimension.title: Goods Item. Measurement_ Dimension. Dimension
MeasurementDimension.description: A measurable dimension (length, mass, weight, or volume) of this goods item.

ContainingPackage.title: Goods Item. Containing_ Package. Package
ContainingPackage.description: A package containing this goods item.

ShipmentDocumentReference.title: Goods Item. Shipment_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ShipmentDocumentReference.description: A reference to a shipping document associated with this goods item.

GoodsItemContainer.title: Goods Item Container. Details
GoodsItemContainer.description: A class defining how goods items are split across transport equipment.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Goods Item Container. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this goods item container.

Quantity.title: Goods Item Container. Quantity
Quantity.description: The number of goods items loaded into or onto one piece of transport equipment as a total consignment or part of a consignment.

TransportEquipment.title: Goods Item Container. Transport Equipment
TransportEquipment.description: A piece of transport equipment used to contain a single goods item.

GoodsItemPassportCounterfoil.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Details
GoodsItemPassportCounterfoil.description: A class describing a Goods Item Passport or ATA Carnet Counterfoil

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Identifier
ID.description: This identifier for this Goods Item Passport Counterfoil

GoodsItemPassportID.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Goods Item Passport Identifier. Identifier
GoodsItemPassportID.description: The identifier of the Goods Item Passport or ATA Carnet of this counterfoil, usually the number on the upper part of the orange hazard placard required on the means of transport

FinalReexportationDate.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Final_ Reexportation Date. Date
FinalReexportationDate.description: Final date of re-exportation, if less than the overall validity period of te Goods Item Passport or ATA Carnet

Note.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

CustomsOfficeLocation.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Customs Office_ Location. Location
CustomsOfficeLocation.description: The location of the customs office to where the counterfoil has been presented

GoodsItem.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Goods Item
GoodsItem.description: A goods item associated with this counterfoil

ExportationDocumentReference.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Exportation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ExportationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document used for the export of the goods related to this counterfoil

ImportationDocumentReference.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Importation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ImportationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document used for the import of the goods related to this counterfoil

ReexportationDocumentReference.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Reexportation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ReexportationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document used for the re-exportation of the goods related to this counterfoil

ReimportationDocumentReference.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Reimportation_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ReimportationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document used for re-importation of the goods related to this counterfoil

VoucherDocumentReference.title: Goods Item Passport Counterfoil. Voucher_ Document Reference. Document Reference
VoucherDocumentReference.description: A reference to a voucher related to this counterfoil

GoodsProcessing.title: Goods Processing. Details
GoodsProcessing.description: A class to describe the processing of goods and products

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Goods Processing. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this goods processing.

TypeCode.title: Goods Processing. Type. Code
TypeCode.description: A type code for this goods processing.

Description.title: Goods Processing. Description. Text
Description.description: A description for this goods processing expressed in one or more languages

Note.title: Goods Processing. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Period.title: Goods Processing. Period
Period.description: The period within this goods processing was performed

CriterionItem.title: Goods Processing. Criterion Item
CriterionItem.description: A reference to a criterion item that applies to this goods processing

SubGoodsProcessing.title: Goods Processing. Sub_ Goods Processing. Goods Processing
SubGoodsProcessing.description: A subordinate processing to this goods processing

HazardousGoodsTransit.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Details
HazardousGoodsTransit.description: A class to describe hazardous goods in transit.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

TransportEmergencyCardCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Transport Emergency Card Code. Code
TransportEmergencyCardCode.description: An identifier for a transport emergency card describing the actions to be taken in an emergency in transporting the hazardous goods. It may be the identity number of a hazardous emergency response plan assigned by the appropriate authority.

PackingCriteriaCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Packing Criteria Code. Code
PackingCriteriaCode.description: A code signifying the packaging requirement for transportation of the hazardous goods as assigned by IATA, IMDB, ADR, RID etc.

HazardousRegulationCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Hazardous Regulation Code. Code
HazardousRegulationCode.description: A code signifying the set of legal regulations governing the transportation of the hazardous goods.

InhalationToxicityZoneCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Inhalation Toxicity Zone Code. Code
InhalationToxicityZoneCode.description: A code signifying the Inhalation Toxicity Hazard Zone for the hazardous goods, as defined by the US Department of Transportation.

TransportAuthorizationCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Transport Authorization Code. Code
TransportAuthorizationCode.description: A code signifying authorization for the transportation of hazardous cargo.

TransitDescription.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Transit Description. Text
TransitDescription.description: A textual description of this hazardous goods transit.

MaximumTemperature.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Maximum_ Temperature. Temperature
MaximumTemperature.description: The maximum temperature at which the hazardous goods can safely be transported.

MinimumTemperature.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Minimum_ Temperature. Temperature
MinimumTemperature.description: The minimum temperature at which the hazardous goods can safely be transported.

HazardousItem.title: Hazardous Item. Details
HazardousItem.description: A class to describe a hazardous item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Hazardous Item. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this hazardous item.

PlacardNotation.title: Hazardous Item. Placard Notation. Text
PlacardNotation.description: Text of the placard notation corresponding to the hazard class of this hazardous item. Can also be the hazard identification number of the orange placard (upper part) required on the means of transport.

PlacardEndorsement.title: Hazardous Item. Placard Endorsement. Text
PlacardEndorsement.description: Text of the placard endorsement that is to be shown on the shipping papers for this hazardous item. Can also be used for the number of the orange placard (lower part) required on the means of transport.

AdditionalInformation.title: Hazardous Item. Additional_ Information. Text
AdditionalInformation.description: Text providing further information about the hazardous substance.

UNDGCode.title: Hazardous Item. UNDG Code. Code
UNDGCode.description: The UN code for this kind of hazardous item.

UNPackingGroupCode.title: Hazardous Item. UN Packing Group Code. Code
UNPackingGroupCode.description: A code signifying the UN Packing Group protective packaging requirements for this hazardous item.

UNPackingGroup.title: Hazardous Item. UN Packing Group. Text
UNPackingGroup.description: A text describing the UN Packing Group protective packaging requirements for this hazardous item.

EmergencyProceduresCode.title: Hazardous Item. Emergency Procedures Code. Code
EmergencyProceduresCode.description: A code signifying the emergency procedures for this hazardous item.

MedicalFirstAidGuideCode.title: Hazardous Item. Medical First Aid Guide Code. Code
MedicalFirstAidGuideCode.description: A code signifying a medical first aid guide appropriate to this hazardous item.

TunnelRestrictionCode.title: Hazardous Item. Tunnel Restriction Code. Code
TunnelRestrictionCode.description: A code signifying the restrictions for this hazardous item for passing through a tunnel.

MaritimePollutantCode.title: Hazardous Item. Maritime_ Pollutant Code. Code
MaritimePollutantCode.description: A code for specifying the maritime pollutant for this hazardous item.

TechnicalName.title: Hazardous Item. Technical_ Name. Name
TechnicalName.description: The full technical name of a specific hazardous substance contained in this goods item.

CategoryName.title: Hazardous Item. Category. Name
CategoryName.description: The name of the category of hazard that applies to the Item.

HazardousCategoryCode.title: Hazardous Item. Hazardous Category Code. Code
HazardousCategoryCode.description: A code signifying a kind of hazard for a material.

UpperOrangeHazardPlacardID.title: Hazardous Item. Upper_ Orange Hazard Placard Identifier. Identifier
UpperOrangeHazardPlacardID.description: The number for the upper part of the orange hazard placard required on the means of transport.

LowerOrangeHazardPlacardID.title: Hazardous Item. Lower_ Orange Hazard Placard Identifier. Identifier
LowerOrangeHazardPlacardID.description: The number for the lower part of the orange hazard placard required on the means of transport.

MarkingID.title: Hazardous Item. Marking Identifier. Identifier
MarkingID.description: An identifier to the marking of the Hazardous Item

HazardClassID.title: Hazardous Item. Hazard Class Identifier. Identifier
HazardClassID.description: An identifier for the hazard class applicable to this hazardous item as defined by the relevant regulation authority (e.g., the IMDG Class Number of the SOLAS Convention of IMO and the ADR/RID Class Number for the road/rail environment).

NetWeightMeasure.title: Hazardous Item. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The net weight of this hazardous item, excluding packaging.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Hazardous Item. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The volume of this hazardous item, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

Quantity.title: Hazardous Item. Quantity
Quantity.description: The quantity of goods items in this hazardous item that are hazardous.

ContactParty.title: Hazardous Item. Contact_ Party. Party
ContactParty.description: The individual, group, or body to be contacted in case of a hazardous incident associated with this item.

SecondaryHazard.title: Hazardous Item. Secondary Hazard
SecondaryHazard.description: A secondary hazard associated with this hazardous item.

HazardousGoodsTransit.title: Hazardous Item. Hazardous Goods Transit
HazardousGoodsTransit.description: Information related to the transit of this kind of hazardous goods.

EmergencyTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Emergency_ Temperature. Temperature
EmergencyTemperature.description: The threshold temperature at which emergency procedures apply in the handling of temperature-controlled goods.

FlashpointTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Flashpoint_ Temperature. Temperature
FlashpointTemperature.description: The flashpoint temperature of this hazardous item; i.e., the lowest temperature at which vapors above a volatile combustible substance ignite in air when exposed to flame.

AdditionalTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Additional_ Temperature. Temperature
AdditionalTemperature.description: Another temperature relevant to the handling of this hazardous item.

PositionOnBoardStowage.title: Hazardous Item. Position On Board_ Stowage. Stowage
PositionOnBoardStowage.description: A stowage indicating where to find this hazardous item.

ISPSRequirements.title: ISPS Requirements. Details
ISPSRequirements.description: A class to describe a set of ISPS Requirements.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: ISPS Requirements. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for these ISPS requirements.

ValidISSCIndicator.title: ISPS Requirements. Valid_ ISSC Indicator. Indicator
ValidISSCIndicator.description: An indicator of whether the International Ship Security Certificate (ISSC) is valid (true) or not (false).

ISSCAbsenceReason.title: ISPS Requirements. ISSC Absence_ Reason. Text
ISSCAbsenceReason.description: A text describing the reason if not having a International Ship Security Certificate (ISSC).

ISSCExpiryDate.title: ISPS Requirements. ISSC Expiry_ Date. Date
ISSCExpiryDate.description: The expiration date of the International Ship Security Certificate (ISSC).

SSPOnBoardIndicator.title: ISPS Requirements. SSP On Board_ Indicator. Indicator
SSPOnBoardIndicator.description: An indicator of whether the vessel has a Ship Security Plan (SSP) on board (true) or not (false).

SSPSecurityMeasuresAppliedIndicator.title: ISPS Requirements. SSP Security Measures Applied_ Indicator. Indicator
SSPSecurityMeasuresAppliedIndicator.description: An indication of whether the Ship Security Plan (SSP) meassures are applied (true) or not (false).

CurrentOperatingSecurityLevelCode.title: ISPS Requirements. Current Operating_ Security Level Code. Code
CurrentOperatingSecurityLevelCode.description: A code describing the current operating security level.

AdditionalMattersDescription.title: ISPS Requirements. Additional_ Matters Description. Text
AdditionalMattersDescription.description: A textual description of any addidtional matters concerning these ISPS requirements.

AdditionalSecurityMeasure.title: ISPS Requirements. Additional_ Security Measure. Security Measure
AdditionalSecurityMeasure.description: Security measures for these ISPS requirements in addition to those in the ship security plan, such as special measures taken in response to unforeseen events.

PortCallRecord.title: ISPS Requirements. Port Call Record
PortCallRecord.description: The port call records for these ISPS requirements.

ShipToShipActivityRecord.title: ISPS Requirements. Ship To Ship Activity Record
ShipToShipActivityRecord.description: The recordded ship to ship activities for these ISPS requirements.

ReportLocation.title: ISPS Requirements. Report_ Location. Location
ReportLocation.description: The location where these ISPC requirements are reported.

ISSCIssuerParty.title: ISPS Requirements. ISSC Issuer_ Party. Party
ISSCIssuerParty.description: The party issuing the International Ship Security Cetificate (ISSC).

SecurityOfficerPerson.title: ISPS Requirements. Security Officer_ Person. Person
SecurityOfficerPerson.description: The security officer reponsible for these ISPC requirements.

ImmobilizedSecurity.title: Immobilized Security. Details
ImmobilizedSecurity.description: A class to describe an immobilized security to be used as a guarantee.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ImmobilizationCertificateID.title: Immobilized Security. Immobilization Certificate Identifier. Identifier
ImmobilizationCertificateID.description: An identifier for the certificate of this immobilized security.

SecurityID.title: Immobilized Security. Security Identifier. Identifier
SecurityID.description: An identifier for the security being immobilized.

IssueDate.title: Immobilized Security. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date on which this immobilized security was issued.

FaceValueAmount.title: Immobilized Security. Face Value. Amount
FaceValueAmount.description: The value of the security on the day it was immobilized.

MarketValueAmount.title: Immobilized Security. Market Value. Amount
MarketValueAmount.description: The current market value of the immobilized security.

IssuerParty.title: Immobilized Security. Issuer_ Party. Party
IssuerParty.description: The party issuing the immobilized security certificate.

LongitudeMinutesMeasure.description: The minutes component of a longitude measured in degrees and minutes (modulo 60).

MaritimeHealthDeclaration.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Details
MaritimeHealthDeclaration.description: A class to desccribe a maritime health declaration.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this maritime health declaration.

InfectiousDiseaseCaseOnBoardIndicator.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Infectious Disease Case On Board_ Indicator. Indicator
InfectiousDiseaseCaseOnBoardIndicator.description: Indicates whether there is an infectious diasase case on board (true) or not (false).

MoreIllThanExpectedIndicator.title: Maritime Health Declaration. More Ill Than Expected_ Indicator. Indicator
MoreIllThanExpectedIndicator.description: Indicates whether a sick person is more ill than extected (true) or not (false).

MedicalPractitionerConsultedIndicator.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Medical Practitioner Consulted_ Indicator. Indicator
MedicalPractitionerConsultedIndicator.description: Indicates whether a medical practioner has been consulted (true) or not (false).

StowawaysFoundOnBoardIndicator.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Stowaways Found On Board_ Indicator. Indicator
StowawaysFoundOnBoardIndicator.description: Indicates whether stowaways have been found on board (true) or not (false).

SickAnimalOnBoardIndicator.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Sick_ Animal On Board Indicator. Indicator
SickAnimalOnBoardIndicator.description: Indicates whether a sick animal is on board (true) or not (false).

FumigatedCargoTransportIndicator.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Fumigated_ Cargo Transport Indicator. Indicator
FumigatedCargoTransportIndicator.description: Indicates whether the cargo under transport has been fumigated (true) or not (false).

SanitaryMeasuresAppliedIndicator.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Sanitary Measures Applied_ Indicator. Indicator
SanitaryMeasuresAppliedIndicator.description: Indicates whether sanity measures are applied (true) or not (false).

ValidSanitationCertificateOnBoardIndicat.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Valid_ Sanitation Certificate On Board Indicator. Indicator
ValidSanitationCertificateOnBoardIndicat.description: Indicates whether a valid sanitary certificate is on board (true) or not (false).

ReinspectionRequiredIndicator.description: Indicates whether a reinspaction is required (true) or not (false).

TotalDeadPersonQuantity.description: Specifies the total number of dead persons on board the vessel.

TotalIllPersonQuantity.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Total Ill_ Person Quantity. Quantity
TotalIllPersonQuantity.description: Specifies the total number of ill persons on board the vessel.

SickAnimalDescription.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Sick_ Animal Description. Text
SickAnimalDescription.description: Describes any sick animals on board the vessel.

StowawayDescription.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Stowaway Description. Text
StowawayDescription.description: Describes any stowaways on board the vessel.

LastDrinkingWaterAnalysisDate.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Last_ Drinking Water Analysis Date. Date
LastDrinkingWaterAnalysisDate.description: The date when the last drinking water analysis was made.

WHOAffectedAreaVisit.title: Maritime Health Declaration. WHO Affected Area Visit
WHOAffectedAreaVisit.description: A WHO Affected Area visit related to this maritime health declaration.

PersonnelHealthIncident.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Personnel Health Incident
PersonnelHealthIncident.description: A personal health incident related to this maritime health declaration.

SanitaryMeasure.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Sanitary Measure
SanitaryMeasure.description: A sanitary meassure for this health declaration.

PlaceOfReportLocation.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Place Of Report_ Location. Location
PlaceOfReportLocation.description: The location where this maritime health declaration is reported.

MedicalCertificate.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Medical_ Certificate. Certificate
MedicalCertificate.description: The medical certificate for this maritime health declaration.

ShipSanitationControlCertificate.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Ship Sanitation Control_ Certificate. Certificate
ShipSanitationControlCertificate.description: A certificate describing the sanitation control of this maritime health certificate.

ShipSanitationControlExemptionDocumentRe.title: Maritime Health Declaration. Ship Sanitation Control Exemption_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ShipSanitationControlExemptionDocumentRe.description: A reference to a document evidencing the exemption of a ship sanitation control certificate, when absent.

MaritimeTransport.title: Maritime Transport. Details
MaritimeTransport.description: A class to describe a vessel used for transport by water (including sea, river, and canal).

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

GrossTonnageMeasure.title: Maritime Transport. Gross Tonnage. Measure
GrossTonnageMeasure.description: Gross tonnage is calculated by measuring a ship's volume (from keel to funnel, to the outside of the hull framing) and applying a mathematical formula and is used to determine things such as a ship's manning regulations, safety rules, registration fees and port dues.

NetTonnageMeasure.title: Maritime Transport. Net Tonnage. Measure
NetTonnageMeasure.description: Net tonnage is calculated by measuring a ship's internal volume and applying a mathematical formula and is used to calculate the port duties.

SegregatedBallastMeasure.title: Maritime Transport. Segregated Ballast. Measure
SegregatedBallastMeasure.description: The measure of the segregated ballast of the vessel.

ShipConfigurationCode.title: Maritime Transport. Ship_ Configuration Code. Code
ShipConfigurationCode.description: A code specifying the ship configuration.

AntennaLocus.title: Maritime Transport. Antenna Locus. Text
AntennaLocus.description: The locus or exact location of the antenna on the vessel

RegistryCertificateDocumentReference.title: Maritime Transport. Registry Certificate_ Document Reference. Document Reference
RegistryCertificateDocumentReference.description: The certificate issued to the ship by the ships registry in a given flag state.

RegistryPortLocation.description: The port in which a vessel is registered or permanently based.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

SubstitutionStatusCode.description: A code signifying the substitution status of the item on this order line. The order line may indicate that the substitute is proposed by the buyer (in Order) or by the seller (in Order Response) or that a substitution has been made by the seller (in Order Response).

Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

The specified quantity and pricing may differ from those in the original line item, but when a line item is substituted by the seller, it is assumed that other information, such as shipment details, will remain the same.

EstimatedOverallContractAmount.title: Requested Tender Total. Estimated_ Overall Contract. Amount
EstimatedOverallContractAmount.description: The estimated overall monetary amount of a contract.

EstimatedOverallFrameworkContractsAmount.title: Requested Tender Total. Estimated_ Overall Framework Contracts. Amount
EstimatedOverallFrameworkContractsAmount.description: The estimated overall monetary amount of subsequent framework contracts.

TotalAmount.title: Requested Tender Total. Total_ Amount. Amount
TotalAmount.description: The monetary amount of the total budget including net amount, taxes, and material and instalment costs.

TaxIncludedIndicator.title: Requested Tender Total. Tax Included_ Indicator. Indicator
TaxIncludedIndicator.description: Indicates whether the amounts are taxes included (true) or not (false).

MinimumAmount.title: Requested Tender Total. Minimum_ Amount. Amount
MinimumAmount.description: The minimum monetary amount of the budget.

MaximumAmount.title: Requested Tender Total. Maximum_ Amount. Amount
MaximumAmount.description: The maximum monetary amount of the budget.

MonetaryScope.title: Requested Tender Total. Monetary Scope. Text
MonetaryScope.description: A description of the monetary scope of the budget.

AverageSubsequentContractAmount.title: Requested Tender Total. Average_ Subsequent Contract. Amount
AverageSubsequentContractAmount.description: The average monetary amount for the subsequent contracts following this budget amount.

ApplicableTaxCategory.title: Requested Tender Total. Applicable_ Tax Category. Tax Category
ApplicableTaxCategory.description: Describes the categories of taxes that apply to the budget amount.

Response.title: Response. Details
Response.description: A class to describe an application-level response to a document.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ReferenceID.title: Response. Reference. Identifier
ReferenceID.description: An identifier for the section (or line) of the document to which this response applies.

ResponseCode.title: Response. Response Code. Code
ResponseCode.description: A code signifying the type of response.

EffectiveDate.title: Response. Effective Date. Date
EffectiveDate.description: The date upon which this response is valid.

EffectiveTime.title: Response. Effective Time. Time
EffectiveTime.description: The time at which this response is valid.

Status.title: Response. Status
Status.description: A status report associated with this response.

ResponseValue.title: Response Value. Details
ResponseValue.description: A class to describe the criterion requirement response value.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Response Value. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier to refer to the criterion requirement response value.

Description.title: Response Value. Description. Text
Description.description: A description of the response value to the criterion requirement.

Response.title: Response Value. Response Text. Text
Response.description: A text or name used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseAmount.title: Response Value. Response Amount. Amount
ResponseAmount.description: An amount used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseBinaryObject.title: Response Value. Response Binary Object. Binary Object
ResponseBinaryObject.description: A binary graphic, picture, sound or video object used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseCode.title: Response Value. Response Code. Code
ResponseCode.description: A code used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseDate.title: Response Value. Response Date. Date
ResponseDate.description: A date used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseID.title: Response Value. Response Identifier. Identifier
ResponseID.description: An identifier used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseIndicator.title: Response Value. Response Indicator. Indicator
ResponseIndicator.description: An indicator used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseMeasure.title: Response Value. Response Measure. Measure
ResponseMeasure.description: A measure used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseNumeric.title: Response Value. Response Numeric. Numeric
ResponseNumeric.description: A number, rate or percent used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseQuantity.title: Response Value. Response Quantity. Quantity
ResponseQuantity.description: A quantity used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseTime.title: Response Value. Response Time. Time
ResponseTime.description: A time used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResponseURI.title: Response Value. Response URI. Identifier
ResponseURI.description: A URI value used as a reply to the criterion requirement.

ResultOfVerification.title: Result Of Verification. Details
ResultOfVerification.description: A class to describe the result of an attempt to verify a signature.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ValidatorID.title: Result Of Verification. Validator. Identifier
ValidatorID.description: An identifier for the organization, person, service, or server that verified the signature.

ValidationResultCode.title: Result Of Verification. Validation_ Result Code. Code
ValidationResultCode.description: A code signifying the result of the verification.

ValidationDate.title: Result Of Verification. Validation Date. Date
ValidationDate.description: The date upon which verification took place.

ValidationTime.title: Result Of Verification. Validation Time. Time
ValidationTime.description: The time at which verification took place.

ValidateProcess.title: Result Of Verification. Validate_ Process. Text

ValidateTool.title: Result Of Verification. Validate_ Tool. Text
ValidateTool.description: The tool used to verify the signature.

ValidateToolVersion.title: Result Of Verification. Validate_ Tool Version. Text
ValidateToolVersion.description: The version of the tool used to verify the signature.

SignatoryParty.title: Result Of Verification. Signatory_ Party. Party

RetailPlannedImpact.title: Retail Planned Impact. Details
RetailPlannedImpact.description: A class to describe a planned effect of a retail event (e.g., a promotion or a change in inventory policy) upon supply or demand.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Amount.title: Retail Planned Impact. Amount
Amount.description: Estimated monetary value of the planned event as an impact

ForecastPurposeCode.title: Retail Planned Impact. Forecast_ Purpose Code. Code
ForecastPurposeCode.description: It will have impact on either Sales forecast or Order Forecast

ForecastTypeCode.title: Retail Planned Impact. Forecast Type Code. Code
ForecastTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of forecast. Examples of values are: BASE PROMOTIONAL SEASONAL TOTAL

Period.title: Retail Planned Impact. Period
Period.description: The period to which this impact applies.

RoadTransport.title: Road Transport. Details
RoadTransport.description: A class for identifying a vehicle used for road transport.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

LicensePlateID.title: Road Transport. License Plate Identifier. Identifier
LicensePlateID.description: The license plate identifier of this vehicle.

SalesItem.title: Sales Item. Details
SalesItem.description: A class to describe information related to an item in a sales context

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Quantity.title: Sales Item. Quantity
Quantity.description: The quantity the given information are related to

ActivityProperty.title: Sales Item. Activity Property
ActivityProperty.description: A class to describe the activity (for example "sales", "movement", ...) related to the item.

TaxExclusivePrice.title: Sales Item. Tax Exclusive_ Price. Price
TaxExclusivePrice.description: A price for this sales item, exclusive of tax.

TaxInclusivePrice.title: Sales Item. Tax Inclusive_ Price. Price
TaxInclusivePrice.description: A price for this sales item, including tax.

SanitaryMeasure.title: Sanitary Measure. Details
SanitaryMeasure.description: A class describing a plan, action or meassure that has been implemented for sanitary reasons.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

SanitaryMeasureTypeCode.title: Sanitary Measure. Sanitary Measure Type. Code
SanitaryMeasureTypeCode.description: A code decribing the type of sanitary meassure.

ApplicationDate.title: Sanitary Measure. Application. Date
ApplicationDate.description: The date this sanitary meassure was applied.

SecondaryHazard.title: Secondary Hazard. Details
SecondaryHazard.description: A class to describe a secondary hazard associated with a hazardous item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Secondary Hazard. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this secondary hazard.

PlacardNotation.title: Secondary Hazard. Placard Notation. Text
PlacardNotation.description: Text of the placard notation corresponding to the hazard class of this secondary hazard. Can also be the hazard identification number of the orange placard (upper part) required on the means of transport.

PlacardEndorsement.title: Secondary Hazard. Placard Endorsement. Text
PlacardEndorsement.description: Text of the placard endorsement for this secondary hazard that is to be shown on the shipping papers for a hazardous item. Can also be used for the number of the orange placard (lower part) required on the means of transport.

EmergencyProceduresCode.title: Secondary Hazard. Emergency Procedures Code. Code
EmergencyProceduresCode.description: A code signifying the emergency procedures for this secondary hazard.

Extension.title: Secondary Hazard. Extension. Text
Extension.description: Additional information about the hazardous substance, which can be used (for example) to specify the type of regulatory requirements that apply to this secondary hazard.

SecurityClearanceTerm.title: Security Clearance Term. Details
SecurityClearanceTerm.description: A class to specify security clearance terms.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Code.title: Security Clearance Term. Code
Code.description: A code signifying the security clearance requirement.

Description.title: Security Clearance Term. Description. Text
Description.description: A description of the security clearance requirement.

SecurityMeasure.title: Security Measure. Details
SecurityMeasure.description: A class to describe a security measure

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Security Measure. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this security measure.

Description.title: Security Measure. Description. Text
Description.description: The description of this security measure

ServiceFrequency.title: Service Frequency. Details
ServiceFrequency.description: A class to specify which day of the week a transport service is operational.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

WeekDayCode.title: Service Frequency. Week Day. Code
WeekDayCode.description: A day of the week, expressed as code.

ServiceLevelAgreement.title: Service Level Agreement. Details
ServiceLevelAgreement.description: A class to describe a service level agreement which regulates the quality, availability and responsibilities of digital services.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Service Level Agreement. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this service level agreement.

ServiceTypeCode.title: Service Level Agreement. Service Type Code. Code
ServiceTypeCode.description: A specific type of service subject to this service level agreement.

ServiceType.title: Service Level Agreement. Service Type. Text
ServiceType.description: A specific type of service subject to this service level agreement, expressed as text.

AvailabilityTimePercent.title: Service Level Agreement. Availability_ Time Percent. Percent
AvailabilityTimePercent.description: The availability percentage (e.g. 98.5% of the time).

MondayAvailabilityIndicator.title: Service Level Agreement. Monday Availability_ Indicator. Indicator
MondayAvailabilityIndicator.description: Indicates whether this service is available on monday (true) or not (false).

TuesdayAvailabilityIndicator.title: Service Level Agreement. Tuesday Availability_ Indicator. Indicator
TuesdayAvailabilityIndicator.description: Indicates whether this service is available on tuesday (true) or not (false).

WednesdayAvailabilityIndicator.title: Service Level Agreement. Wednesday Availability_ Indicator. Indicator
WednesdayAvailabilityIndicator.description: Indicates whether this service is available on wednesday (true) or not (false).

ThursdayAvailabilityIndicator.title: Service Level Agreement. Thursday Availability_ Indicator. Indicator
ThursdayAvailabilityIndicator.description: Indicates whether this service is available on thursday (true) or not (false).

FridayAvailabilityIndicator.title: Service Level Agreement. Friday Availability_ Indicator. Indicator
FridayAvailabilityIndicator.description: Indicates whether this service is available on friday (true) or not (false).

SaturdayAvailabilityIndicator.title: Service Level Agreement. Saturday Availability_ Indicator. Indicator
SaturdayAvailabilityIndicator.description: Indicates whether this service is available on saturday (true) or not (false).

SundayAvailabilityIndicator.title: Service Level Agreement. Sunday Availability_ Indicator. Indicator
SundayAvailabilityIndicator.description: Indicates whether this service is available on sunday (true) or not (false).

MinimumResponseTimeDurationMeasure.title: Service Level Agreement. Minimum_ Response Time Duration. Measure
MinimumResponseTimeDurationMeasure.description: The response time for aknowledgment (e.g. to send a receipt to a sending Access Point within 300 seconds).

MinimumDownTimeScheduleDurationMeasure.title: Service Level Agreement. Minimum_ Down Time Schedule Duration. Measure
MinimumDownTimeScheduleDurationMeasure.description: The minimum down time schedule for programmed maintenance (e.g. scheduled 3 days before).

MaximumIncidentNotificationDurationMeasu.title: Service Level Agreement. Maximum_ Incident Notification Duration. Measure
MaximumIncidentNotificationDurationMeasu.description: The maximum length of time between the occurrence of an incident and the issuance of a notification (e.g. within 4 hours).

MaximumDataLossDurationMeasure.title: Service Level Agreement. Maximum_ Data Loss Duration. Measure
MaximumDataLossDurationMeasure.description: The maximum data loss permitted (e.g. last 24 hours).

MeanTimeToRecoverDurationMeasure.title: Service Level Agreement. Mean_ Time To Recover Duration. Measure
MeanTimeToRecoverDurationMeasure.description: The time taken to recover after an outage of service (e.g. 3 hours).

ServiceAvailabilityPeriod.title: Service Level Agreement. Service Availability_ Period. Period
ServiceAvailabilityPeriod.description: The period for which the service is available.

ServiceMaintenancePeriod.title: Service Level Agreement. Service Maintenance_ Period. Period
ServiceMaintenancePeriod.description: The period of time designated in advance by the technical staff, during which preventive maintenance that could cause disruption of service may be performed.

ServiceProviderParty.title: Service Provider Party. Details
ServiceProviderParty.description: A class to describe a party contracting to provide services, such as transportation, finance, etc.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Service Provider Party. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this service provider.

ServiceTypeCode.title: Service Provider Party. Service Type Code. Code
ServiceTypeCode.description: The type of service provided, expressed as a code.

ServiceType.title: Service Provider Party. Service Type. Text
ServiceType.description: The type of service provided, expressed as text.

SellerContact.title: Service Provider Party. Seller_ Contact. Contact
SellerContact.description: The contact for the service provider.

ShareholderParty.title: Shareholder Party. Details
ShareholderParty.description: A class to describe a shareholder party.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

PartecipationPercent.title: Shareholder Party. Partecipation. Percent
PartecipationPercent.description: The shareholder participation, expressed as a percentage.

ShipRequirement.title: Ship Requirement. Details
ShipRequirement.description: A class to describe a requirement for a ship

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Ship Requirement. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this ship requirement.

Description.title: Ship Requirement. Description. Text
Description.description: The description of this ship requirement

ShipStoreArticle.title: Ship Store Article. Details
ShipStoreArticle.description: An article in the ship's stores during a shipment stage.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Ship Store Article. Identifier
ID.description: An indentifier for this ship store article.

Name.title: Ship Store Article. Name
Name.description: A name for this ship store article.

Quantity.title: Ship Store Article. Quantity
Quantity.description: The quantity of this ship store article.

OfficialUse.title: Ship Store Article. Official Use. Text
OfficialUse.description: A text describing the official use of this ship store article.

Stowage.title: Ship Store Article. Stowage
Stowage.description: The stowage or location on board of this ship store article.

ShipToShipActivityRecord.title: Ship To Ship Activity Record. Details
ShipToShipActivityRecord.description: A class to describe a ship to ship activity record.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Ship To Ship Activity Record. Identifier
ID.description: An indentifier for this ship to ship activity.

Description.title: Ship To Ship Activity Record. Description. Text
Description.description: A text describing the ship to ship activity.

AppliedSecurityMeasure.title: Ship To Ship Activity Record. Applied_ Security Measure. Security Measure
AppliedSecurityMeasure.description: Any security measures applied to this ship to ship activity in lieu of those specified in the approved Ship Security Plan (SSP).

Period.title: Ship To Ship Activity Record. Period
Period.description: The duration of this ship to ship activity.

Location.title: Ship To Ship Activity Record. Location
Location.description: The location where this ship to ship activity took place.

Shipment.title: Shipment. Details
Shipment.description: A class defining an identifiable collection of one or more goods items to be transported between the seller party and the buyer party. This information may be defined within a commercial contract. A shipment can be transported in different consignments (e.g., split for logistical purposes).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Shipment. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this shipment.

ShippingPriorityLevelCode.title: Shipment. Shipping Priority Level Code. Code
ShippingPriorityLevelCode.description: A code signifying the priority or level of service required for this shipment.

HandlingCode.title: Shipment. Handling Code. Code
HandlingCode.description: The handling required for this shipment, expressed as a code.

HandlingInstructions.title: Shipment. Handling_ Instructions. Text
HandlingInstructions.description: The handling required for this shipment, expressed as text.

Information.title: Shipment. Information. Text
Information.description: Free-form text pertinent to this shipment, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

GrossWeightMeasure.title: Shipment. Gross_ Weight. Measure
GrossWeightMeasure.description: The total gross weight of a shipment; the weight of the goods plus packaging plus transport equipment.

NetWeightMeasure.title: Shipment. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The net weight of this shipment, excluding packaging.

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Shipment. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of this shipment, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Shipment. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in this shipment, including packaging.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Shipment. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in this shipment, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

TotalGoodsItemQuantity.title: Shipment. Total_ Goods Item Quantity. Quantity
TotalGoodsItemQuantity.description: The total number of goods items in this shipment.

TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.title: Shipment. Total_ Transport Handling Unit Quantity. Quantity
TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.description: The number of pieces of transport handling equipment (pallets, boxes, cases, etc.) in this shipment.

InsuranceValueAmount.title: Shipment. Insurance_ Value. Amount
InsuranceValueAmount.description: The amount covered by insurance for this shipment.

DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.title: Shipment. Declared Customs_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.description: The total declared value for customs purposes of those goods in this shipment that are subject to the same customs procedure and have the same tariff/statistical heading, country information, and duty regime.

DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.title: Shipment. Declared For Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.description: The value of this shipment, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.title: Shipment. Declared Statistics_ Value. Amount
DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.description: The value, declared for statistical purposes, of those goods in this shipment that have the same statistical heading.

FreeOnBoardValueAmount.title: Shipment. Free On Board_ Value. Amount
FreeOnBoardValueAmount.description: The monetary amount that has to be or has been paid as calculated under the applicable trade delivery.

SpecialInstructions.title: Shipment. Special_ Instructions. Text
SpecialInstructions.description: Special instructions relating to this shipment.

DeliveryInstructions.title: Shipment. Delivery_ Instructions. Text
DeliveryInstructions.description: Delivery instructions relating to this shipment.

SplitConsignmentIndicator.title: Shipment. Split Consignment_ Indicator. Indicator
SplitConsignmentIndicator.description: An indicator that the consignment has been split in transit (true) or not (false).

ConsignmentQuantity.title: Shipment. Consignment_ Quantity. Quantity
ConsignmentQuantity.description: The total number of consignments within this shipment.

GoodsItem.title: Shipment. Goods Item
GoodsItem.description: A goods item included in this shipment.

ShipmentStage.title: Shipment. Shipment Stage
ShipmentStage.description: A stage in the transport movement of this shipment.

TransportHandlingUnit.title: Shipment. Transport Handling Unit
TransportHandlingUnit.description: A transport handling unit associated with this shipment.

ReturnAddress.title: Shipment. Return_ Address. Address
ReturnAddress.description: The address to which a shipment should be returned.

OriginAddress.title: Shipment. Origin_ Address. Address
OriginAddress.description: The region in which the goods have been produced or manufactured, according to criteria laid down for the purposes of application of the customs tariff, or of quantitative restrictions, or of any other measure related to trade.

FirstArrivalPortLocation.title: Shipment. First Arrival Port_ Location. Location
FirstArrivalPortLocation.description: The first arrival location of a shipment. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.

LastExitPortLocation.title: Shipment. Last Exit Port_ Location. Location
LastExitPortLocation.description: The final exporting location for a shipment. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.

ExportCountry.title: Shipment. Export_ Country. Country
ExportCountry.description: The country from which the goods were originally exported, without any commercial transaction taking place in intermediate countries.

FreightAllowanceCharge.title: Shipment. Freight_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge
FreightAllowanceCharge.description: A cost incurred by the shipper in moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another under the terms of the contract of carriage. In addition to transport costs, this may include such elements as packing, documentation, loading, unloading, and insurance to the extent that they relate to the freight costs.

ShipmentStage.title: Shipment Stage. Details
ShipmentStage.description: A class to describe one stage of movement in a transport of goods.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Shipment Stage. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this shipment stage.

ShipmentStageTypeCode.title: Shipment Stage. Shipment Stage Type Code. Code
ShipmentStageTypeCode.description: The type of shipment stage, expressed as a code.

ShipmentStageType.title: Shipment Stage. Shipment Stage Type. Text
ShipmentStageType.description: The type of shipment stage, expressed as text.

TransportModeCode.title: Shipment Stage. Transport Mode Code. Code
TransportModeCode.description: A code signifying the method of transport used for this shipment stage.

TransportMeansTypeCode.title: Shipment Stage. Transport Means Type Code. Code
TransportMeansTypeCode.description: A code signifying the kind of transport means (truck, vessel, etc.) used for this shipment stage.

TransitDirectionCode.title: Shipment Stage. Transit_ Direction Code. Code
TransitDirectionCode.description: A code signifying the direction of transit in this shipment stage.

PreCarriageIndicator.title: Shipment Stage. Pre Carriage_ Indicator. Indicator
PreCarriageIndicator.description: An indicator that this stage takes place before the main carriage of the shipment (true) or not (false).

OnCarriageIndicator.title: Shipment Stage. On Carriage_ Indicator. Indicator
OnCarriageIndicator.description: An indicator that this stage takes place after the main carriage of the shipment (true) or not (false).

CabotageIndicator.title: Shipment Stage. Cabotage_ Indicator. Indicator
CabotageIndicator.description: An indicator that cabotage applies for this shipment stage (true) or not (false).

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Shipment Stage. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indicator that the transported goods in this shipment stage are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

EstimatedDeliveryDate.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated_ Delivery Date. Date
EstimatedDeliveryDate.description: The estimated date of delivery in this shipment stage.

EstimatedDeliveryTime.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated_ Delivery Time. Time
EstimatedDeliveryTime.description: The estimated time of delivery in this shipment stage.

RequiredDeliveryDate.title: Shipment Stage. Required_ Delivery Date. Date
RequiredDeliveryDate.description: The delivery date required by the buyer in this shipment stage.

RequiredDeliveryTime.title: Shipment Stage. Required_ Delivery Time. Time
RequiredDeliveryTime.description: The delivery time required by the buyer in this shipment stage.

LoadingSequenceID.title: Shipment Stage. Loading_ Sequence Identifier. Identifier
LoadingSequenceID.description: An identifier for the loading sequence (of consignments) associated with this shipment stage.

SuccessiveSequenceID.title: Shipment Stage. Successive_ Sequence Identifier. Identifier
SuccessiveSequenceID.description: Identifies the successive loading sequence (of consignments) associated with a shipment stage.

Instructions.title: Shipment Stage. Instructions. Text
Instructions.description: Text of instructions applicable to a shipment stage.

DemurrageInstructions.title: Shipment Stage. Demurrage_ Instructions. Text
DemurrageInstructions.description: Text of instructions relating to demurrage (the case in which a vessel is prevented from loading or discharging cargo within the stipulated laytime).

CrewQuantity.title: Shipment Stage. Crew Quantity. Quantity
CrewQuantity.description: The total number of crew aboard a transport means.

PassengerQuantity.title: Shipment Stage. Passenger Quantity. Quantity
PassengerQuantity.description: The total number of passengers aboard a transport means.

TransitPeriod.title: Shipment Stage. Transit_ Period. Period
TransitPeriod.description: The period during which this shipment stage actually took place.

CarrierParty.title: Shipment Stage. Carrier_ Party. Party
CarrierParty.description: A carrier party responsible for this shipment stage.

TransportMeans.title: Shipment Stage. Transport Means
TransportMeans.description: The means of transport used in this shipment stage.

LoadingPortLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Loading Port_ Location. Location
LoadingPortLocation.description: The location of loading for a shipment stage.

UnloadingPortLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Unloading Port_ Location. Location
UnloadingPortLocation.description: The location of unloading for a shipment stage.

TransshipPortLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Transship Port_ Location. Location
TransshipPortLocation.description: The location of transshipment relating to a shipment stage.

LoadingTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Loading_ Transport Event. Transport Event
LoadingTransportEvent.description: The loading of goods in this shipment stage.

ExaminationTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Examination_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ExaminationTransportEvent.description: The examination of shipments in this shipment stage.

AvailabilityTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Availability_ Transport Event. Transport Event
AvailabilityTransportEvent.description: The making available of shipments in this shipment stage.

ExportationTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Exportation_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ExportationTransportEvent.description: The export event associated with this shipment stage.

DischargeTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Discharge_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DischargeTransportEvent.description: The discharge event associated with this shipment stage.

WarehousingTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Warehousing_ Transport Event. Transport Event
WarehousingTransportEvent.description: The warehousing event associated with this shipment stage.

TakeoverTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Takeover_ Transport Event. Transport Event
TakeoverTransportEvent.description: The receiver's takeover of the goods in this shipment stage.

OptionalTakeoverTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Optional Takeover_ Transport Event. Transport Event
OptionalTakeoverTransportEvent.description: The optional takeover of the goods in this shipment stage.

DropoffTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Dropoff_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DropoffTransportEvent.description: The dropping off of goods in this shipment stage.

ActualPickupTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Actual Pickup_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualPickupTransportEvent.description: The pickup of goods in this shipment stage.

DeliveryTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Delivery_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DeliveryTransportEvent.description: The delivery of goods in this shipment stage.

ReceiptTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Receipt_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ReceiptTransportEvent.description: The receipt of goods in this shipment stage.

StorageTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Storage_ Transport Event. Transport Event
StorageTransportEvent.description: The storage of goods in this shipment stage.

AcceptanceTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Acceptance_ Transport Event. Transport Event
AcceptanceTransportEvent.description: The acceptance of goods in this shipment stage.

TerminalOperatorParty.title: Shipment Stage. Terminal Operator_ Party. Party
TerminalOperatorParty.description: A terminal operator associated with this shipment stage.

CustomsAgentParty.title: Shipment Stage. Customs Agent_ Party. Party
CustomsAgentParty.description: A customs agent associated with this shipment stage.

EstimatedTransitPeriod.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated Transit_ Period. Period
EstimatedTransitPeriod.description: The estimated transit period of this shipment stage.

FreightAllowanceCharge.title: Shipment Stage. Freight_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge
FreightAllowanceCharge.description: A freight allowance charge for this shipment stage.

FreightChargeLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Freight Charge_ Location. Location
FreightChargeLocation.description: The location associated with a freight charge related to this shipment stage.

DetentionTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Detention_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DetentionTransportEvent.description: The detention of a transport means during loading and unloading operations.

RequestedDepartureTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Requested Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
RequestedDepartureTransportEvent.description: The departure requested by the party requesting a transportation service.

RequestedArrivalTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Requested Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
RequestedArrivalTransportEvent.description: The arrival requested by the party requesting a transportation service.
