RequestedWaypointTransportEvent.description: A waypoint requested by the party requesting a transportation service.

PlannedDepartureTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Planned Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedDepartureTransportEvent.description: The departure planned by the party providing a transportation service.

PlannedArrivalTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Planned Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedArrivalTransportEvent.description: The arrival planned by the party providing a transportation service.

PlannedWaypointTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Planned Waypoint_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedWaypointTransportEvent.description: A waypoint planned by the party providing a transportation service.

ActualDepartureTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Actual Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualDepartureTransportEvent.description: The actual departure from a specific location during a transportation service.

ActualWaypointTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Actual Waypoint_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualWaypointTransportEvent.description: The location of an actual waypoint during a transportation service.

ActualArrivalTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Actual Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualArrivalTransportEvent.description: The actual arrival at a specific location during a transportation service.

TransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Transport Event
TransportEvent.description: A significant occurrence in the course of this shipment of goods.

EstimatedDepartureTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
EstimatedDepartureTransportEvent.description: Describes an estimated departure at a location during a transport service.

EstimatedArrivalTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
EstimatedArrivalTransportEvent.description: Describes an estimated arrival at a location during a transport service.

PassengerPerson.title: Shipment Stage. Passenger_ Person. Person
PassengerPerson.description: A person who travels in a conveyance without participating in its operation.

DriverPerson.title: Shipment Stage. Driver_ Person. Person
DriverPerson.description: Describes a person responsible for driving the transport means.

ReportingPerson.title: Shipment Stage. Reporting_ Person. Person
ReportingPerson.description: Describes a person being responsible for providing the required administrative reporting relating to a transport.

CrewMemberPerson.title: Shipment Stage. Crew Member_ Person. Person
CrewMemberPerson.description: A person operating or serving aboard a transport means.

SecurityOfficerPerson.title: Shipment Stage. Security Officer_ Person. Person
SecurityOfficerPerson.description: The person on board the vessel, accountable to the master, designated by the company as responsible for the security of the ship, including implementation and maintenance of the ship security plan and for the liaison with the company security officer and the port facility security officers.

MasterPerson.title: Shipment Stage. Master_ Person. Person
MasterPerson.description: The person responsible for the ship's safe and efficient operation, including cargo operations, navigation, crew management and for ensuring that the vessel complies with local and international laws, as well as company and flag state policies.

ShipsSurgeonPerson.title: Shipment Stage. Ships Surgeon_ Person. Person
ShipsSurgeonPerson.description: The person responsible for the health of the people aboard a ship at sea.

DestinationPortCall.title: Shipment Stage. Destination_ Port Call. Port Call
DestinationPortCall.description: A destination port call for this shipment stage.

ShipStoreArticle.title: Shipment Stage. Ship Store Article
ShipStoreArticle.description: The ship store articles for this shipment stage.

CrewPersonEffect.title: Shipment Stage. Crew Person Effect
CrewPersonEffect.description: The crew person effects for this shipment stage.

MaritimeWaste.title: Shipment Stage. Maritime Waste
MaritimeWaste.description: The maritime waste for this shipment stage.

BallastWaterSummary.title: Shipment Stage. Ballast Water Summary
BallastWaterSummary.description: A ballast water summary for this shipment stage.

ISPSRequirements.title: Shipment Stage. ISPS Requirements
ISPSRequirements.description: The ISPS (International Ship and Port Facility Security Code) requirements for this shipment stage.

MaritimeHealthDeclaration.title: Shipment Stage. Maritime Health Declaration
MaritimeHealthDeclaration.description: A maritime declaration of health for this shipment stage.

Signature.title: Signature. Details
Signature.description: A class to define a signature.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Signature. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this signature.

ReasonCode.title: Signature. Reason. Code
ReasonCode.description: A code defining the reason or purpose of this signature

Note.title: Signature. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures; in particular, information regarding the circumstances in which the signature is being used.

ValidationDate.title: Signature. Validation Date. Date
ValidationDate.description: The date upon which this signature was verified.

ValidationTime.title: Signature. Validation Time. Time
ValidationTime.description: The time at which this signature was verified.

ValidatorID.title: Signature. Validator. Identifier
ValidatorID.description: An identifier for the organization, person, service, or server that verified this signature.

CanonicalizationMethod.title: Signature. Canonicalization Method. Text
CanonicalizationMethod.description: The method used to perform XML canonicalization of this signature.

SignatureMethod.title: Signature. Signature Method. Text
SignatureMethod.description: Text describing the method of signature.

DigitalSignatureAttachment.title: Signature. Digital Signature_ Attachment. Attachment
DigitalSignatureAttachment.description: The actual encoded signature (e.g., in XMLDsig format).

OriginalDocumentReference.title: Signature. Original_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OriginalDocumentReference.description: A reference to the document that the signature applies to. For evidentiary purposes, this may be the document image that the signatory party saw when applying their signature.

SocialMediaProfile.title: Social Media Profile. Details
SocialMediaProfile.description: A class to describe a social media profile.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.description: An identifier for a specific social media.

Name.title: Social Media Profile. Name
Name.description: The common name of the social media.

SocialMediaTypeCode.title: Social Media Profile. Social Media Type Code. Code
SocialMediaTypeCode.description: A code that specifies the type of social media.

URI.title: Social Media Profile. URI. Identifier
URI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of a party profile in the social media; i.e., its Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

StatementLine.title: Statement Line. Details
StatementLine.description: A class to define a line in a Statement of account.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Statement Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this statement line.

Note.title: Statement Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for this statement line.

BalanceBroughtForwardIndicator.description: An indication that this statement line contains an outstanding balance from the previous bill(s) (true) or does not (false).

DebitLineAmount.title: Statement Line. Debit_ Line Amount. Amount
DebitLineAmount.description: The amount debited on this statement line.

CreditLineAmount.title: Statement Line. Credit_ Line Amount. Amount
CreditLineAmount.description: The amount credited on this statement line.

BalanceAmount.title: Statement Line. Balance Amount. Amount
BalanceAmount.description: The balance amount on this statement line.

PaymentPurposeCode.title: Statement Line. Payment Purpose Code. Code
PaymentPurposeCode.description: A code signifying the business purpose for this payment.

PaymentMeans.title: Statement Line. Payment Means
PaymentMeans.description: A means of payment associated with this statement line.

PaymentTerms.title: Statement Line. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A specification of payment terms associated with this statement line.

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Statement Line. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party
BuyerCustomerParty.description: The buyer associated with this statement line.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Statement Line. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party
SellerSupplierParty.description: The seller/supplier associated with this statement line.

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Statement Line. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Statement Line. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party
AccountingCustomerParty.description: The Accounting Customer Party related to the statement information reported on this Statement Line.

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Statement Line. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party
AccountingSupplierParty.description: The Accounting Supplier Party related to the statement information reported on this Statement Line.

InvoicePeriod.title: Statement Line. Invoice_ Period. Period
InvoicePeriod.description: An invoice period to which this statement line applies.

BillingReference.title: Statement Line. Billing Reference
BillingReference.description: A reference to a billing document associated with this statement line.

DocumentReference.title: Statement Line. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document associated with this statement line.

ExchangeRate.title: Statement Line. Exchange Rate
ExchangeRate.description: The rate of exchange between the currency of the Statement and the currency of the document described in the BillingReference.

AllowanceCharge.title: Statement Line. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A charge or discount price component associated with this statement line.

Status.title: Status. Details
Status.description: A class to describe the condition or position of an object.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ConditionCode.title: Status. Condition Code. Code
ConditionCode.description: Specifies the status condition of the related object.

ReferenceDate.title: Status. Reference Date. Date
ReferenceDate.description: The reference date for this status.

ReferenceTime.title: Status. Reference Time. Time
ReferenceTime.description: The reference time for this status.

StatusReasonCode.title: Status. Status Reason Code. Code
StatusReasonCode.description: The reason for this status condition or position, expressed as a code.

StatusReason.title: Status. Status_ Reason. Text
StatusReason.description: The reason for this status condition or position, expressed as text.

SequenceID.title: Status. Sequence Identifier. Identifier
SequenceID.description: A sequence identifier for this status.

Text.title: Status. Text
Text.description: Provides any textual information related to this status.

IndicationIndicator.title: Status. Indication_ Indicator. Indicator
IndicationIndicator.description: Specifies an indicator relevant to a specific status.

Percent.title: Status. Percent
Percent.description: A percentage meaningful in the context of this status.

ReliabilityPercent.title: Status. Reliability Percent. Percent
ReliabilityPercent.description: The reliability of this status, expressed as a percentage.

SubStatus.title: Status. Sub_ Status. Status
SubStatus.description: An additional sub status to clarify or ellaborate on the status

Condition.title: Status. Condition
Condition.description: Measurements that quantify the condition of the objects covered by the status.

StockAvailabilityReportLine.title: Stock Availability Report Line. Details
StockAvailabilityReportLine.description: A class to define a line in a Stock Availability Report describing the availability of an item of sale.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Stock Availability Report Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this stock availability line.

Note.title: Stock Availability Report Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the item currently in stock.

ValueAmount.title: Stock Availability Report Line. Value. Amount
ValueAmount.description: The monetary value of the quantity of the item currently in stock.

AvailabilityDate.title: Stock Availability Report Line. Availability Date. Date
AvailabilityDate.description: The date from which the item will be available. A date identical to or earlier than the IssueDate of the Stock Availability Report means that the item is available now

AvailabilityStatusCode.title: Stock Availability Report Line. Availability Status Code. Code
AvailabilityStatusCode.description: A code signifying the level of availability of the item.

Item.title: Stock Availability Report Line. Item
Item.description: The item associated with this stock availability report line.

Storage.title: Storage. Details
Storage.description: A class to describe a storage and storage requirements

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Storage. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this storage.

Name.title: Storage. Name

GateID.title: Storage. Gate Identifier. Identifier
GateID.description: An identifier for the agreed gate to enter, deliver or pick up at this storage

AirFlowPercent.description: The percent of the airflow within this storage.

HumidityPercent.description: The percent humidity within this storage.

AnimalFoodApprovedIndicator.description: An indicator that this storage is approved for animal food (true) or not (false).

HumanFoodApprovedIndicator.description: An indicator that this storage is approved for human food (true) or not (false).

DangerousGoodsApprovedIndicator.description: An indicator that this stroage is approved for dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

RefrigeratedIndicator.title: Storage. Refrigerated_ Indicator. Indicator
RefrigeratedIndicator.description: An indicator that storage is refrigerated (true) or not (false).

PowerIndicator.description: An indicator that this storage can supply power (true) or not (false).

MinimumTemperature.description: The minimum allowable operating temperature for this refriguated storage.

MaximumTemperature.title: Storage. Maximum_ Temperature. Temperature
MaximumTemperature.description: The maximum allowable operating temperature for this refriguated storage.

Certificate.description: A certificate associated with this storage

UnknownPriceIndicator.description: An indicator that the subcontract price is known (true) or not (false).

MaximumPercent.description: The maximum percentage allowed to be subcontracted.

MinimumPercent.title: Subcontract Terms. Minimum_ Percent. Percent
MinimumPercent.description: The minimum percentage allowed to be subcontracted.

SubscriberConsumption.title: Subscriber Consumption. Details
SubscriberConsumption.description: The consumption for a specific party for given consumption point provided by a numbers of suppliers. An enterprise can have one utility statement for several parties (e.g. a ministry of defence receiving a telephone bill). In this way each subscriber consumption represent a sub utility statement.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

SpecificationTypeCode.title: Subscriber Consumption. Specification Type Code. Code
SpecificationTypeCode.description: The code which specifies the type of this specification, e.g. an on account specification or the yearly specification.

Note.title: Subscriber Consumption. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

TotalMeteredQuantity.title: Subscriber Consumption. Total Metered Quantity. Quantity
TotalMeteredQuantity.description: The total quantity consumed, as calculated from meter readings.

SubscriberParty.title: Subscriber Consumption. Subscriber_ Party. Party
SubscriberParty.description: The party subscribing to the utility.

UtilityConsumptionPoint.title: Subscriber Consumption. Utility_ Consumption Point. Consumption Point
UtilityConsumptionPoint.description: The point at which the utility is consumed.

OnAccountPayment.title: Subscriber Consumption. On Account Payment
OnAccountPayment.description: The planned prepayments (on account) regarding this subscription.

Consumption.title: Subscriber Consumption. Consumption
Consumption.description: The consumption in case the consumption is from one and only one supplier.

SupplierConsumption.title: Subscriber Consumption. Supplier Consumption
SupplierConsumption.description: The consumption in case the consumption is from more than one supplier.

SupplierConsumption.title: Supplier Consumption. Details
SupplierConsumption.description: The consumption in case the consumption is for one and only one supplier.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Description.title: Supplier Consumption. Description. Text
Description.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

UtilitySupplierParty.title: Supplier Consumption. Utility Supplier_ Party. Party

UtilityCustomerParty.title: Supplier Consumption. Utility Customer_ Party. Party

Contract.title: Supplier Consumption. Contract
Contract.description: A contract setting forth conditions regulating the consumption.

ConsumptionLine.title: Supplier Consumption. Consumption Line
ConsumptionLine.description: The consumption of a utility product.

SupplierParty.title: Supplier Party. Details
SupplierParty.description: A class to describe a supplier party.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

CustomerAssignedAccountID.title: Supplier Party. Customer Assigned_ Account Identifier. Identifier
CustomerAssignedAccountID.description: An identifier for this supplier party, assigned by the customer.

AdditionalAccountID.title: Supplier Party. Additional_ Account Identifier. Identifier
AdditionalAccountID.description: An additional identifier for this supplier party.

DataSendingCapability.title: Supplier Party. Data Sending Capability. Text
DataSendingCapability.description: Text describing the supplier's ability to send invoice data via a purchase card provider (e.g., VISA, MasterCard, American Express).

DespatchContact.title: Supplier Party. Despatch_ Contact. Contact
DespatchContact.description: A contact at this supplier party for despatches (pickups).

AccountingContact.title: Supplier Party. Accounting_ Contact. Contact
AccountingContact.description: A contact at this supplier party for accounting.

SellerContact.title: Supplier Party. Seller_ Contact. Contact
SellerContact.description: The primary contact for this supplier party.

TaxCategory.title: Tax Category. Details
TaxCategory.description: A class to describe one of the tax categories within a taxation scheme (e.g., High Rate VAT, Low Rate VAT).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Tax Category. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this tax category.

Name.title: Tax Category. Name
Name.description: The name of this tax category.

Percent.title: Tax Category. Percent
Percent.description: The tax rate for this category, expressed as a percentage.

BaseUnitMeasure.title: Tax Category. Base Unit Measure. Measure
BaseUnitMeasure.description: A Unit of Measures used as the basic for the tax calculation applied at a certain rate per unit.

PerUnitAmount.title: Tax Category. Per Unit_ Amount. Amount
PerUnitAmount.description: Where a tax is applied at a certain rate per unit, the rate per unit applied.

TaxExemptionReasonCode.title: Tax Category. Tax Exemption Reason Code. Code
TaxExemptionReasonCode.description: The reason for tax being exempted, expressed as a code.

TaxExemptionReason.title: Tax Category. Tax Exemption Reason. Text
TaxExemptionReason.description: The reason for tax being exempted, expressed as text.

TierRange.title: Tax Category. Tier Range. Text
TierRange.description: Where a tax is tiered, the range of taxable amounts that determines the rate of tax applicable to this tax category.

TierRatePercent.title: Tax Category. Tier Rate. Percent
TierRatePercent.description: Where a tax is tiered, the tax rate that applies within the specified range of taxable amounts for this tax category.

TaxScheme.title: Tax Category. Tax Scheme
TaxScheme.description: The taxation scheme within which this tax category is defined.

TaxScheme.title: Tax Scheme. Details
TaxScheme.description: A class to describe a taxation scheme (e.g., VAT, State tax, County tax).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Tax Scheme. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this taxation scheme.

Name.title: Tax Scheme. Name
Name.description: The name of this taxation scheme.

TaxTypeCode.title: Tax Scheme. Tax Type Code. Code
TaxTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of tax.

CurrencyCode.title: Tax Scheme. Currency Code. Code
CurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency in which the tax is collected and reported.

JurisdictionRegionAddress.title: Tax Scheme. Jurisdiction Region_ Address. Address
JurisdictionRegionAddress.description: A geographic area in which this taxation scheme applies.

TaxSubtotal.title: Tax Subtotal. Details
TaxSubtotal.description: A class to define the subtotal for a particular tax category within a particular taxation scheme, such as standard rate within VAT.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

TaxableAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Taxable_ Amount. Amount
TaxableAmount.description: The net amount to which the tax percent (rate) is applied to calculate the tax amount.

TaxAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Tax Amount. Amount
TaxAmount.description: The amount of this tax subtotal.

CalculationSequenceNumeric.title: Tax Subtotal. Calculation Sequence. Numeric
CalculationSequenceNumeric.description: The number of this tax subtotal in the sequence of subtotals corresponding to the order in which multiple taxes are applied. If all taxes are applied to the same taxable amount (i.e., their order of application is inconsequential), then CalculationSequenceNumeric is 1 for all tax subtotals applied to a given amount.

TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Transaction Currency_ Tax Amount. Amount
TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The amount of this tax subtotal, expressed in the currency used for invoicing.

Percent.title: Tax Subtotal. Percent
Percent.description: The tax rate of the tax category applied to this tax subtotal, expressed as a percentage.

BaseUnitMeasure.title: Tax Subtotal. Base Unit Measure. Measure
BaseUnitMeasure.description: The unit of measure on which the tax calculation is based

PerUnitAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Per Unit_ Amount. Amount
PerUnitAmount.description: Where a tax is applied at a certain rate per unit, the rate per unit applied.

TierRange.title: Tax Subtotal. Tier Range. Text
TierRange.description: Where a tax is tiered, the range of taxable amounts that determines the rate of tax applicable to this tax subtotal.

TierRatePercent.title: Tax Subtotal. Tier Rate. Percent
TierRatePercent.description: Where a tax is tiered, the tax rate that applies within a specified range of taxable amounts for this tax subtotal.

TaxCategory.title: Tax Subtotal. Tax Category
TaxCategory.description: The tax category applicable to this subtotal.

TaxTotal.title: Tax Total. Details
TaxTotal.description: A class to describe the total tax for a particular taxation scheme.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

TaxAmount.title: Tax Total. Tax Amount. Amount
TaxAmount.description: The total tax amount for a particular taxation scheme, e.g., VAT; the sum of the tax subtotals for each tax category within the taxation scheme.

CalculationSequenceNumeric.title: Tax Total. Calculation Sequence. Numeric
CalculationSequenceNumeric.description: The number of this tax total in the sequence of tax totals corresponding to the order in which multiple taxes are applied. If all taxes are applied to the same taxable amount (i.e., their order of application is inconsequential), then CalculationSequenceNumeric is 1 for all tax totals applied to a given amount.

RoundingAmount.title: Tax Total. Rounding Amount. Amount
RoundingAmount.description: The rounding amount (positive or negative) added to the calculated tax total to produce the rounded TaxAmount.

TaxEvidenceIndicator.title: Tax Total. Tax Evidence_ Indicator. Indicator
TaxEvidenceIndicator.description: An indicator that this total is recognized as legal evidence for taxation purposes (true) or not (false).

TaxIncludedIndicator.title: Tax Total. Tax Included_ Indicator. Indicator
TaxIncludedIndicator.description: An indicator that tax is included in the calculation (true) or not (false).

TaxSubtotal.title: Tax Total. Tax Subtotal
TaxSubtotal.description: One of the subtotals the sum of which equals the total tax amount for a particular taxation scheme.

TelecommunicationsServiceCategory.description: The telecommunications category, expressed as text.

TelecommunicationsServiceCategoryCode.title: Telecommunications Service. Telecommunications Service Category Code. Code
TelecommunicationsServiceCategoryCode.description: The telecommunications category, expressed as a code.

MovieTitle.description: The title of a movie delivered via this telecommunications service.

RoamingPartnerName.title: Telecommunications Service. Roaming Partner Name. Name
RoamingPartnerName.description: Statement of the roaming partner name.

PayPerView.title: Telecommunications Service. Pay Per View. Text
PayPerView.description: A pay-per-view delivered via this telecommunications service.

Quantity.title: Telecommunications Service. Quantity
Quantity.description: The number of calls.

TelecommunicationsServiceCall.title: Telecommunications Service. Telecommunications Service Call. Text
TelecommunicationsServiceCall.description: The telecommunications call described as a text

TelecommunicationsServiceCallCode.title: Telecommunications Service. Telecommunications Service Call Code. Code
TelecommunicationsServiceCallCode.description: The telecommunications call described as a code

CallBaseAmount.title: Telecommunications Service. Call Base_ Amount. Amount

CallExtensionAmount.title: Telecommunications Service. Call Extension_ Amount. Amount
CallExtensionAmount.description: The amount to be payed for the call

TelecommunicationsSupplyTypeCode.description: The type of telecommunications supply, expressed as a code.

PrivacyCode.description: A code signifying the level of confidentiality of this information for this telecommunication supply.

TotalAmount.title: Telecommunications Supply. Total_ Amount. Amount
TotalAmount.description: The total amount associated with this telecommunications supply.

LineExtensionAmount.title: Telecommunications Supply Line. Line Extension Amount. Amount
LineExtensionAmount.description: An amount specifying the cost of this telecommunication line

TaxInclusiveLineExtensionAmount.title: Telecommunications Supply Line. Tax Inclusive_ Line Extension Amount. Amount
TaxInclusiveLineExtensionAmount.description: The total amount for this telecommunications supply line, including all allowances, charges and taxes.

StatusLocation.title: Transport Schedule. Status_ Location. Location
StatusLocation.description: The location for which status is reported.

ActualArrivalTransportEvent.description: The actual arrival at a location.

ActualDepartureTransportEvent.title: Transport Schedule. Actual Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualDepartureTransportEvent.description: The actual departure from a location.

EstimatedDepartureTransportEvent.title: Transport Schedule. Estimated Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
EstimatedDepartureTransportEvent.description: An estimated departure from a specified location.

EstimatedArrivalTransportEvent.title: Transport Schedule. Estimated Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
EstimatedArrivalTransportEvent.description: An estimated arrival at a specified location.

PlannedDepartureTransportEvent.description: The planned departure from a specified location.

PlannedArrivalTransportEvent.title: Transport Schedule. Planned Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedArrivalTransportEvent.description: The planned arrival at a specified location.

TransportationSegment.title: Transportation Segment. Details
TransportationSegment.description: A class to describe one segment or leg in a transportation service.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

SequenceNumeric.title: Transportation Segment. Sequence. Numeric
SequenceNumeric.description: A number indicating the order of this segment in the sequence of transportation segments making up a transportation service.

TransportExecutionPlanReferenceID.title: Transportation Segment. Transport Execution Plan Reference. Identifier
TransportExecutionPlanReferenceID.description: An identifier for the transport execution plan governing this transportation segment.

TransportationService.description: The transportation service used in this transportation segment.

TransportServiceProviderParty.description: The transport service provider responsible for carrying out transportation services in this transportation segment.

ReferencedConsignment.title: Transportation Segment. Referenced_ Consignment. Consignment
ReferencedConsignment.description: A consignment referenced in this transportation segment. Such a consignment may have different identifiers than the consignment identifiers being used in the transportation service agreed between the transport user and the transport service provider.

ShipmentStage.title: Transportation Segment. Shipment Stage
ShipmentStage.description: The shipment stage associated with this transportation segment.

TransportationService.title: Transportation Service. Details
TransportationService.description: A class to describe a transportation service.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

TransportServiceCode.title: Transportation Service. Transport Service Code. Code
TransportServiceCode.description: A code signifying the extent of this transportation service (e.g., door-to-door, port-to-port).

TariffClassCode.title: Transportation Service. Tariff Class Code. Code
TariffClassCode.description: A code signifying the tariff class applicable to this transportation service.

Priority.title: Transportation Service. Priority. Text

FreightRateClassCode.title: Transportation Service. Freight Rate Class Code. Code

TransportationServiceDescription.title: Transportation Service. Transportation Service Description. Text

TransportationServiceDetailsURI.title: Transportation Service. Transportation Service Details URI. Identifier
TransportationServiceDetailsURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of a document providing additional details regarding this transportation service.

NominationDate.title: Transportation Service. Nomination Date. Date
NominationDate.description: In a transport contract, the deadline date by which this transportation service has to be booked. For example, if this service is scheduled for Wednesday 16 February 2011 at 10 a.m. CET, the nomination date might be Tuesday15 February 2011.

NominationTime.title: Transportation Service. Nomination Time. Time
NominationTime.description: In a transport contract, the deadline time by which this transportation service has to be booked. For example, if this service is scheduled for Wednesday 16 February 2011 at 10 a.m. CET, the nomination date might be Tuesday15 February 2011 and the nomination time 4 p.m. at the latest.

Name.title: Transportation Service. Name
Name.description: The name of this transportation service.

SequenceNumeric.title: Transportation Service. Sequence. Numeric
SequenceNumeric.description: A number indicating the order of this transportation service in a sequence of transportation services.

SupportedTransportEquipment.title: Transportation Service. Supported_ Transport Equipment. Transport Equipment
SupportedTransportEquipment.description: A piece of transport equipment supported in this transportation service.

UnsupportedTransportEquipment.title: Transportation Service. Unsupported_ Transport Equipment. Transport Equipment
UnsupportedTransportEquipment.description: A piece of transport equipment that is not supported in this transportation service.

CommodityClassification.title: Transportation Service. Commodity Classification

SupportedCommodityClassification.description: A classification (e.g., general cargo) for commodities that can be handled in this transportation service.

UnsupportedCommodityClassification.description: A classification for commodities that cannot be handled in this transportation service.

TotalCapacityDimension.description: The total capacity or volume available in this transportation service.

ScheduledServiceFrequency.description: A class to specify which day of the week a transport service is operational.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ConsumptionTypeCode.description: The type of product consumed, expressed as a code.

VerifiedGrossMass.title: Verified Gross Mass. Details
VerifiedGrossMass.description: A class to describe a verified gross mass (VGM) measure and its documentation.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Verified Gross Mass. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this mass measure.

WeighingDate.title: Verified Gross Mass. Weighing Date. Date

WeighingTime.title: Verified Gross Mass. Weighing Time. Time

WeighingMethodCode.title: Verified Gross Mass. Weighing Method Code. Code
WeighingMethodCode.description: A code signifying the weighing method used (e.g. according the SOLAS Convention).

WeighingDeviceID.title: Verified Gross Mass. Weighing Device Identifier. Identifier
WeighingDeviceID.description: An identifier for the weighing device used for executing the weight measurement.

WeighingDeviceType.title: Verified Gross Mass. Weighing Device Type. Text
WeighingDeviceType.description: Text describing the weighing device type used for executing the weight measurement.

GrossMassMeasure.title: Verified Gross Mass. Gross_ Mass. Measure
GrossMassMeasure.description: The total verified gross mass of a packed container which includes the cargo weight, block and bracing materials and container tare.

WeighingParty.description: The party executing the weight measure.

ShipperParty.description: The party playing the role of the Shipper (BCO, FF or NVOCC) who is responsible for the VGM (e.g. according the SOLAS Convention).

ResponsibleParty.title: Verified Gross Mass. Responsible_ Party. Party
ResponsibleParty.description: The party responsible for signing the VGM on behalf of the Shipper.

DocumentReference.title: Verified Gross Mass. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to the VGM documentary evidence.

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

NavigationStatusCode.description: A code specifying the navigation status for the vessel.

AtAnchorageIndicator.title: Vessel Dynamics. At Anchorage_ Indicator. Indicator
AtAnchorageIndicator.description: Indicates whether the vessel is at anchor.

CourseOverGroundDirection.description: Text describing the actual direction of progress of a vessel, between two points, in relation to the surface of the earth.

RateOfTurnMeasure.title: Vessel Dynamics. Rate Of Turn Measure. Measure

WebSiteTypeCode.description: A code that specifies the type web site.

URI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the web site; i.e., its Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

URI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this web site; i.e., its Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

WorkPhaseCode.title: Work Phase Reference. Work Phase Code. Code

EndDate.description: The date on which this phase of work ends.

WorkOrderDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document regarding the work order for the project in which this phase of work takes place.
